This hotel is next to the beach, only 20 minutes from downtown Cancun. The hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. Flamingo Cancun Resort also features air conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. The rooms offer a view of the lagoon or a view of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy music, activities and a swim-up bar at the main pool. The Flamingo also offers an oceanfront pool with a relaxing atmosphere. A gym is available. La Fuente Restaurant serves international cuisine with views of the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront Albatros Restaurant and Bar is open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails and music are available at the Palenque Lobby Bar. This is our guests' favorite part of Cancún, according to independent reviews. Couples in particular like the location - they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip. We speak your language! Flamingo Cancun Resort has been welcoming  guests since Sept 13, 2010 Most popular facilities 1 swimming pool Spa Fitness center Room service Restaurant Facilities for disabled guests Non-smoking rooms Bar Good Breakfast Beachfront ATM & Currency Exchange: Need cash? There's an ATM and a currency exchange service at this property.VRBO

name: Krystal Cancun
address: Paseo Kukulcan Km 9 Lotes 9 y 9 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is on the ocean and across from the Cancun Convention Center. It features a sauna, hot tub, an oceanfront pool, while rooms include a minibar and cable TV. Each room at Krystal Cancun provides air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available in every room. The Krystal offers on-site car rental services. Other services include event organization, laundry facilities and a tour desk. Hacienda El Mortero restaurant is on-site at Cancun Krystal. It provides traditional Mexican cuisine and live mariachi music. The resort also offers a buffet breakfast and on-site bars. Only a short walk from the Krystal Cancun are numerous shops and restaurants. Guests at the resort will also find easy access to a variety of recreational activities including snorkeling, sailing and fishing.

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Gr Solaris Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM. 19.5, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This family-friendly beach hotel is ideally situated directly on the seemingly endless white sandy beach, overlooking the azure waters of the Caribbean Sea. The El Rey archaeological zone is only a few steps away, and Cancun International Airport can be reached within 15 minutes by car. The resort features four restaurants and three bars offering both local and international specialties. Guests might make use of the fitness centre and a spa area, and families will delight in the kids' club and nightly entertainment including theme nights, magic shows, karaoke and a casino. Guests can also enjoy courses and daily activities such as cooking and Spanish classes, yoga, and beach volleyball, all during a wonderful, sunny family retreat in Cancun.Ticket Package

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Km 20.5, Blvd. Kukulcan, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Set in Cancún, 700 metres from Playa Punta Nizuc, Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. The property is located 1.2 km from Playa Delfines, 2.8 km from San Miguelito Beach and 7 km from La Isla Shopping Mall. The hotel provides a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe. Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa offers a hot tub. Coco Bongo is 10 km from the accommodation, while Beto Avila Stadium is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 10 km from Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa.

name: Sky Business Hotel
address: ul. Zlotoryjska 30, 59-220 Legnica, Dolnoslaskie
description: Set in Legnica, 300 metres from Art Gallery, Sky Business Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation provides nightclub and an ATM. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Sky Business Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Legnica Cathedral is 300 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Copernicus Wrocław Airport, 67 km from Sky Business Hotel.

name: Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort
address: Ul. Zdrojowa 1, 16-300 Augustów, Podlaskie
description: Located a picturesque setting of Augustów overlooking Lake Necko, Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort offers plenty of activities to make use of its beautiful surroundings. It offers rooms with free wireless internet access. Each of the rooms at Hotel Warszawa has modern amenities, including satellite TV. Each also has a spacious bathroom with a shower. At guests’ request, a children’s bathtub can be added to the room. Guests will enjoy a professional treatment at Hotel Warszawa’s spa centre with massages. Breakfast can be served in the hotel restaurant or brought to the room at the time of choosing. Restaurant also offers international cuisine. Restaurant boasts a wonderful panorama of Lake Necko from an observation deck. Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort has a quiet, private beach. Guests can rent a bike and explore the beautiful forest of Augustów or tour the banks of Netta River. Necko Lake also has watersports facilities, like water skis. You can enjoy a boat trip or a gondola.

name: Przystan Hotel&spa
address: Zeglarska 4, 10-160 Olsztyn (Warminsko-Mazurskie), Warminsko-Mazurskie
description: Przystań Hotel&Spa is located by Lake Ukiel in Olsztyn. It offers a free Wellness Centre, which features a swimming pool, saunas, a hot tub and a gym, Free WiFi access is available. Each room here is air conditioned and will provide you with a TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathrooms come with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box, linen and towels. Guests can benefit from a number of facilities, such as a private beach area and a business centre. Cycling and water sports are some of the activities that can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings. The hotel restaurant serves Asian cuisine, while the well-known Przystań restaurant next door serves regional specialities. Przystań Hotel&Spa is located 3 km from the Olsztyn Old Town and 4.6 km from the Olsztyn Planetarium.

name: Hotel Robert's Port
address: Stare Sady 4, 11-730 Mikołajki, Warminsko-Mazurskie
description: Located in a quiet place in the beautiful Masurian Lake District, the 4-star Hotel Robert's Port offers free access to an indoor pool, a kids' pool and saunas. Rooms are carpeted, air-conditioned and classically decorated. There is a TV with satellite channels, air-condition and a refrigerator in each room. Every room includes a private bathroom with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel has a 24/7 reception. There are two hotel restaurants, where guests can enjoy Polish and international cuisine, and a patio café. The property also features a garden, gym and fitness room. Guests can rent out bicycles, Nordic walking sticks or angling equipment. Kayaks, pedalos and boats are also available. The youngest guests can enjoy themselves in the kids' club, vide games room and a safe outdoor playground. Hot tub and spa treatments for body and face are available at a surcharge. The popular Mikołajki resort is 4 km away and Hotel Robert’s Port is located right on the Tałty Lake.

name: Hotel Aurora Family & Spa
address: ul. Boh. Warszawy 17, 72-500 Międzyzdroje, Zachodniopomorskie
description: Overlooking the pier, Hotel Aurora Family & SPA offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel houses an extensive spa area. The rooms at the Aurora Family & SPA come with a 32-inch LCD TV and a safety deposit box. All feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Aurora’s spa features a 20-metre swimming pool, a sauna, a gym and a massage parlour. Guests can also book a range of beauty treatments. There also is a special swimming pool for children, as well as activities for children are organised by the hotel. The hotel has a restaurant serving traditional Polish dishes, as well as fresh fish and seafood. In the morning guests can enjoy breakfast buffet.

name: Sheraton Sopot Hotel
address: Powstancow Warszawy 6, 81-718 Sopot, Pomorskie
description: Sheraton Sopot Hotel is a 5 star spa hotel located, right at the beach, next to the longest wooden pier in Europe and just 30 minutes away from Gdansk city center and the airport. Our spa hotel offers 189 elegant rooms and renovated suites. The Sheraton Sopot hotel is the ideal destination for every occasion, from family getaways to business stays. Our large Conference Center with 3000 square meters of space divided between 14 conference rooms and 2 foyers can accommodate up to 1100 delegates. After a day of the conference or an active family day out the guests can relax in Sheraton Sopot Spa, which includes a fitness center, swimming pool, Spa Experience Zone with a wide range of saunas, and treatment rooms.Marriott

name: Liss Ard Estate
address: Castletownsend Road, Skibbereen
description: Liss Ard Estate, a member of Irelands prestigious Blue Book, and a AA awarded 5 Star Georgian Country Manor.Escape to 163 acres of pristine nature with manicured gardens, a 40 acre private lake and James Turrells renowned Irish Sky Garden. The Estate features 26 unique guest rooms in the heart of West Cork, the culinary capital of Ireland. Our 26 guest rooms all include an ensuite and are located in the Manor, its adjacent Mews and the Lake House. In 2021 2022 the Estate underwent an extensive renovation which fully renovated all guest rooms and common areas. James Turrells The Irish Sky Garden For over half a century, the internationally renowned landscape artist James Turrell has worked directly with light and space to create artworks that engage viewers with the limits and wonder of human perception. New Yorker critic Calvin Tompkins writes, His work is not about light, or a record of light; it is light the physical presence of light made manifest in sensory form.Our 2 AA Rosette Awarded Restaurant GardenAll dishes are inspired by the seasons and harvested from the garden and coupled with the best local meat, fish and game to bring you a truly authentic West Cork culinary experience. Garden at Liss Ard Estates ethos is founded on sourcing the best local ingredients and supporting small farmers, producers and artisans.iHotelier/iStay

name: JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa
address: 158 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Unwind at a five-star resort in the town of Surfers Paradise. JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa boasts luxurious rooms, award-winning service and a covetable hotel location on Ferny Avenue. Attend events at Gold Coast Convention Centre, treat the family to Sea World Gold Coast and stroll the beautiful beaches of Surfers Paradise. Our redesigned hotel rooms and suites offer an ideal setting to relax, complete with high-speed Wi-Fi, plush bedding and pristine marble bathrooms. Wake up feeling refreshed and ready for adventure in Surfers Paradise. We offer family-friendly resort facilities, from peaceful saltwater lagoons and an outdoor freshwater pool with a slide to a fitness centre and Sport Court®. One-of-a-kind experiences at our hotel include culinary cooking classes, JW Garden herb planting and guided tours, daily fish feeding, snorkeling in the saltwater lagoons and much more. Leave your family vacation to Surfers Paradise richer than when you arrived at JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Hope Harbour Hotel
address: 11 John Lund Drive, Hope Island, QLD 4212
description: Located in Gold Coast, Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour is an easy drive from Warner Bros. Movie World and provides free public parking on site. It has a gym, as well as a sauna, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out feature. The 70 air conditioned rooms have living and dining areas. An in-room safe, a refrigerator and a walk-in closet are also available to guests. Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour's in-house restaurant, The Pier, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. For those with day trips planned, the hotel provides packed lunches if required. Gold Coast Airport is just a 40-minute drive from Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour, and a shuttle service is provided for those staying at the property. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Gold Coast.Revato

name: Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach
address: 81 Surf Parade, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: A breathtaking 5 star hotel on the Gold Coast, Sofitel Broadbeach has an amazing location just 300m away from the beach. Our Broadbeach accommodation offers the ideal base for both business & leisure travellers. This spectacular luxury Gold Coast hotel is within easy reach of Broadbeach's many restaurants, bars and shops, as well as The Star Casino and Gold Coast Convention & Exhibition Centre. Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach is minutes from Surfers Paradise and a short drive away from Gold Coast airport.accorhotels.com

name: Couran Cove Island Resort
address: Gold Coast, South Stradbroke Island, QLD 4216
description: Located on idyllic South Stradbroke Island and on the water’s edge, surrounded by beaches and natural forest, Couran Cove Resort features a large lap pool, children's pool, children's playground, fitness centre and on-site café and restaurant. All accommodation offers a balcony with views, a fully equipped kitchen and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer, iron, ironing board and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a variety of recreational facilities including beach volleyball, basketball, tennis and mini golf as well as an activities program, inflatable water toys, kayaks, stand-up paddle-boards, trampolines and water slides in the lagoon. The extended boardwalk is where you can explore the tropical gardens and treehouse between the surf beach and the marina, and you can also pick up your supply of groceries at the general store. Portside café and Marlin Bar overlooking the marina are popular spaces for relaxation and refreshment. The Poolside Café is open daily for lunch and dinner and offers a range of cosmopolitan meals. Ferries operate regularly to Couran Cove Resort to the Gold Coast, 35 minutes' away.

name: Novotel Cairns Oasis Resort
address: 122 Lake Street, Cairns, QLD 4870
description: Treat yourself to 4.5-star resort style accommodation in the heart of Cairns. Transformed in 2019 with a new lobby, restaurant & bar, guest rooms and public spaces, discover Novotel Cairns Oasis Resort. This excellent family-friendly resort provides fun-filled kids weekend and holiday. With its sandy lagoon style pool, boasting the only swim up bar in cairns, guests can relax by the pool.accorhotels.com

name: Peppers Beach Club & Spa Palm Cove
address: 123 Williams Esplanade, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Your relaxing getaway, the Peppers Beach Club and Spa Palm Cove is an iconic resort comprised of lush green gardens, a rainforest rock pool and signature lagoon pool with sandy beaches. Perfect for a romantic weekend or a relaxing family holiday, wake up to majestic ocean views, a tranquil pool surrounded by lush gardens, or rainforest-clad mountains in stylish Spa Rooms, Suites, Penthouses. Dine on the catch-of-the-day near the Coral Sea, or book a tour to explore world-class attractions.accorhotels.com

name: Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort
address: 29 Soi Karon Nui, Tambon Karon, Amphur Muang, Phuket City 83100
description: A luxurious beach getaway like no other awaits you on a secluded cove against a canvas of sand and sea in Thailand. Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort offers bold new discoveries with top-rated hotel and resort facilities for land and water adventures, a rejuvenating spa, inspired cuisine and forward-thinking services exceeding your wildest desires. The resort's 416 rooms and 54 luxury suites blend the creative and the elemental with authentic Thai accents against a soothing tropical setting. Style coupled with superb amenities allows for a stay of limitless exploration and renewal on the beach. All rooms and suites at our beach resort in Phuket offer unique views, and 67% offer either pool or ocean views.Marriott

address: 21/4 Moo 1 T.Rasada A.Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Five-star luxury awaits in Phuket, Thailand at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket. Overlooking Siray Bay near Phuket Town, our luxurious Phuket beach resort provides an ideal locale for quiet getaways, romantic holidays and corporate retreats. Find us moments from pristine white-sand beaches and local watersports. Take advantage of our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, three outdoor pools, the Westin® Kids Club and Heavenly Spa by Westin™. Sample tantalizing cuisine and refreshing beverages at our six Phuket resort restaurants and bars, many of which boast water views. If you are planning an event in Phuket, choose one of our elegant indoor or outdoor venues. Enjoy room amenities like Heavenly® Beds, rainforest showers, spacious desks, free Wi-Fi and LCD televisions. Admire panoramic sea views or relax on a furnished balcony. Select suites and resort villas include plunge pools and generous entertaining spaces. Find your sanctuary on the beach at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, PhuketMarriott

name: Amari Phuket
address: 2 Meun-Ngern Road, Patong 83150
description: A stone’s throw from Patong Beach, the luxurious Amari Phuket enjoys spectacular views of the Andaman Sea from its private beach. It boasts 2 outdoor pools, a first-class spa and 2 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas. Located in southern Phuket, 1.5 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Mall, Amari Phuket provides free shuttle services to Kata Beach. It is a 55-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Bright and airy, rooms come with private balconies and beautiful views. Amenities include a satellite TV, DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Breeze Spa features a wide range of beauty treatments. Relaxing massages and therapies can be enjoyed from sea-facing pavilions. The hotel also provides an outdoor spa pool and a fitness centre. La Gritta serves Italian dishes featuring gourmet pizzas, fresh pasta, delectable desserts along with an extensive wine list. Seaside international dining is available at Rim Talay and the spectacular Jetty Restaurant. Drinks and quick bites are served at both the Rim Talay Pool and Samutr Bars.

name: Bella Nara Phuket Naiyang Beach
address: 55 Moo 5, Sakoo Subdistrict, Thalang District Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: No description found

name: Cape Sienna Gourmet Hotel & Villas (SHA Plus+)
address: 18/40 Moo 6, Nakalay Road, Kamala 83150
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus features stunning sea views. It has 4 dining options, fitness center and an outdoor pool. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Spacious guest rooms feature modern interiors. They are equipped with air conditioning, a private shower room and flat-screen TV. Some rooms are fitted with a spa bathtub. Guests of Cape Sienna Gourmet can dine at the Poolside Bar & Restaurant, which serves both Asian and international dishes. Plum Prime Steak House at the center of your experience is the charcoal oven. Sienna Rocks Cafe serves Italian Coffee specialties, creative sandwiches & salads. Probably the Best ‘Egg Benedict’ and ‘Oeuf a la cocotte with Gruyere’ can be found. Drinks can be sipped while playing a game of snooker at Vanilla Sky Bar & Lounge, which offers views of Kamala Bay. Facilities provided include manicure, pedicure, spa treatment rooms and 2 swimming pools. Travel arrangements can be made at the hotel’s tour desk. Airport shuttle and car rental services are also available. Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus is a 1-hour flight from Bangkok City, followed by a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The hotel provides free shuttle services to Kamala Beach.

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
address: 555, Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort
address: 16/12 Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Nestled along the picturesque Kamala Bay, Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort cascades down a lush tropical hillside, offering a serene and idyllic setting for a seafront getaway. With breathtaking views overlooking the Andaman Sea, our resort provides a tranquil ambiance that invites relaxation and rejuvenation. Featuring 201 spacious and contemporary rooms and suites, each offering private balconies with spectacular sea and sunset views, our resort ensures a memorable stay. Indulge in culinary delights at our three restaurants and bar: Pool House Kitchen, an all-day dining venue with international and Asian cuisine; Mizu, offering a premium Teppanyaki experience; 180 Degrees, a poolside bar with private cabanas and sun loungers; and Casa Boho, a clifftop three-story restaurant and bar with its own entertainment lounge and infinity pool. At Casa Boho, immerse yourself in the bohemian ambiance, witness breathtaking sunsets at Kamala, and indulge in bold Latin American flavors and expertly crafted cocktails. Experience three unique dining options, including a rooftop bar with stunning views of Kamala Bay, poolside dining, and a gaming Den, all set amidst our distinctive boho-style design. Our resort offers a range of recreational facilities, including the Nahm Spa, Camp Hyatt poolside kids club, a dive center with sustainability initiatives, snorkeling and diving at the house reef, a hilltop Regency Club, a 24-hour fitness center with wellness activities, and the largest seafront infinity pool in Phuket. For meetings and events, we provide modern facilities such as White Canvas, the only fully air-conditioned, seafront glass marquee event space in Phuket, offering beautiful sea views.

name: The Boathouse Phuket
address: 182 Koktanode Road, Kata Beach, Karon 83100
description: The Boathouse Phuket is located at Kata on Phuket's west coast. Boasting an outdoor pool, a restaurant, bar and a 24-hour front desk, It provides free WiFi and parking. The Boathouse Phuket come with both guestrooms and suites. Some units feature views of the Andaman Sea. All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar, an expresso coffee machine as well as tea making facilities. There are also a working desk, a flat screen TV and and en suite bathroom. Guests at this hotel can relax at a swimming pool or engage in water recreations like surfing. The hotel offers beachfront Thai cooking classes and a tour desk. Arrangements can also be made for an airport shuttle, babysitting and dry cleaning. The seafront restaurant, Boathouse, is an award winning restaurant, serving local and international cuisines with matching wine choices from The Boathouse's wine cellar. Boathouse is a 60-minute drive from Phuket Airport and a 20-minute drive from the stunning sunsets at Promthep Cape.

name: Sala Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 333 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Situated along quiet Mai Khao Beach, SALA Phuket Resort features lush garden, 2 beachfront pools and villas with private pools and sundecks. A spa with sauna and steam bath facilities is offered. SALA Phuket Resort & Spa is a 20-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The scenic Phang Nga Bay is a 25-minute ride away. SALA’s rooms and villas offer flat-screen cable TVs and DVD players. Its villas offer outdoor bathrooms with free-standing tubs overlooking the pool. Free Wi-Fi is provided. SALA Spa features 3 beachfront massage terraces which provide respite for tired bodies. A gym is available for fitness-conscious guests. SALA Phuket offers rooftop dining featuring panoramic beach views. Seafood, international and Thai cuisine is served. Guests can sip cocktails and wines at the beachbar and lobby bar while soaking in the calming atmosphere.

name: The Surin Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 118 Moo 3 Pansea Beach, Choeng Thale 83110
description: The Surin Phuket offers a tropical getaway on Pansea Beach’s white sands. This beachfront property offers cottage-style accommodation surrounded by coconut trees. It features an outdoor pool and a spa. Guests enjoy free welcome drink and complimentary use of non-motorized sport facilities. Our hotel’s design is classy and elegant. Built into the tropical bay and verdant environment, while no elevators are installed, guests can appreciate the nature through a series of stairs and walkways that connect the resort Patong’s vibrant nightlife is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Phuket Town is a 40-minute drive away. Rooms come with spacious outdoor lounge areas with garden and beach views. Amenities include a satellite TV. Guests can try various water sports. The sundeck on the beach offers a beautiful view of the Andaman Sea, especially at sunset. The hotel’s dining outlets offer Thai, Western and Asian menus. Barbecue and seafood specialities are also available.

name: Amatara Welleisure Resort - Sha Extra Plus
address: 84 Moo 8 Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Amatara Welleisure Resort presents a timelessly fresh, effortlessly Thai and bespoke resort experience, and features one of South-east Asias best ocean-view spa and wellness facilities. With a personality all of its own and benefitting from one of the regions most incredible locations, Amatara Wellness Resort offers an unrivalled way to explore and enjoy Southern Thailand, an endlessly popular and world renowned leisure and tourism destination.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bandara Villas, Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 96 Moo 8, Wichit 83000
description: Located on Panwa Beach and 2.5 km from Panwa Cape, Bandara Villas, Phuket offers private villas with sea views. Most of the villas here boast a private pool, while some come with a shared infinity pool. This property features a restaurant and a fitness centre. During the stay, guests have access to free WiFi. Within a short drive, guests can find Phuket Aquarium (2.1 km), Khaokhad View Tower (2.5 km) and Chalong Bay (5.17 km). For outdoor enthusiasts, head to Phuket Shooting Range (6.50 km). Phuket International Airport is located 34 km from the property. Offering sea and pool view through the glass wall, each villa is complete with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a sofa set. A terrace with outdoor furniture is available. Featuring a shower, en suites bathroom are equipped with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Bandara Villas, guests can make use of the shuttle service from or to the airport at additional costs. For the guests' additional convenience, the property provides room service. The on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine, whilst the bar can cater for fine selection of specials cocktails and drinks.

name: The Naka Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified is a 10-minute ride from the white sands of Patong Beach and various entertainment options. Offering unique-designed villas with private balconies, the property also boasts an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Phuket Town is approximately a 20-minute drive from The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified. A 40-minute drive takes guests to Phuket International Airport. Stylish villas are tastefully decorated and offer modern facilities such as a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a safety box. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests of The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified can laze by the pool or enjoy pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and meeting facilities. For meals, sample a variety of both Thai and international cuisines served at The Wiwa, an all-day dining restaurant located just 5 steps away from the beach. With particular views of the sea and the sunset, The Nana offers refreshing beverages until late night. The Meka provides guests with a wide range of healthy dishes and drinks.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 99 Muen-Ngoen Road, Tri-Trang Beach, Patong 83150
description: Plan a luxury escape to Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach. Whether you’re visiting Thailand for a family holiday, couple’s getaway or business trip, our five-star resort in Phuket’s location on the sands of Tri-Trang Beach provides a spectacular backdrop. Stay minutes from the entertainment hub of Patong Beach and Phuket Old Town. Take advantage of family-friendly resort amenities, including a 24 hour fitness center, three pools, children's activities and a day spa. Relax at our swim-up bar and sample delicious cuisine at one of the ten restaurants and bars at our Phuket, Thailand, resort. If you're hosting a meeting, choose from over 8,000 square feet of event space, including poolside and beachside settings and one of the largest ballrooms in Phuket. Unwind in rooms and suites featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, mini-refrigerators, work desks, free Wi-Fi and private balconies with pool, garden, beach or sea views. A sophisticated stay awaits at Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin BeachMarriott

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
address: 230, 232 Moo 3, Maikhao, Talang, Mai Khao 83110
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Zenmaya Oceanfront Phuket, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: 6/181 Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham hotel. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts® is an upscale, full-service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world.  It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world-class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more.Wyndham

name: Novotel Phuket Kamala Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 118/16 Moo 3, Kamala 83150
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachis a 3-minute drive from Phuket FantaSea. Offering modern air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony, the hotel is equipped with a spa, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Situated in the quiet end of the beach, the hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Kamala Village and a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Rooms at Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachare fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. An electric kettle and a hairdryer are provided. An en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower facilities. Children can enjoy different activities at Kid’s Club. The hotel features a business centre, a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. It also provides luggage storage facilities and currency exchange service. International dishes (Western, Thai and Indian) are served at Soul Kitchen. Drinks can be order at The Bar or at the swim up bar called Lilo. For light snacks and cocktails, guests can head to On the Roof Bar. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
address: 88 Moo 8, Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 64 Moo 4, Srisoonthorn Road, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach (SHA Plus+)
address: 92, 92/1 Moo 3, Tambol Sakoo, Amphur, Talang, Phuket City 83110
description: Expect the ultimate comfort at Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach. Ideal for families, couples and business travelers, our Nai Yang beach resort inspires relaxation with beachfront rooms and private villas, each featuring plush bedding, marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, flat-panel TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Elevate your stay in a scenic beach villa with a private garden and a 400-meter pool. Relax on our resort's private beach or try out the exciting water activities at Yacht Haven and Royal Phuket Marinas. Reserve one of our dynamic meeting venues, enhanced by cutting-edge AV services, custom catering and skilled event planners. End your day in Phuket, Thailand, with a swim in our lagoon pool, a rejuvenating treatment at our resort spa or delectable fare and creative cocktails at our restaurants and bar. Set on the sands of Nai Yang Beach, minutes from Phuket International Airport, our scenic resort offers guests a serene haven in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.Marriott

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 683 Patak Road, Karon Beach, Karon 83100
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star hotel is located in Karon. Its premium amenities include a sauna and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, SPA Cenvaree. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, a telephone and an in-room safe. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s bar and try international and Asian cuisine in the restaurant. Dining options at the hotel include Lobby Lounge and COAST Beach Club & Bistro. Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is just a stone's throw from Karon Beach and a short car ride from Patong Beach and Kata Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Karon.Revato

name: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas (Sha Plus+)
address: 888 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas is set on Phuket, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Popular facilities, such as outdoor tennis courts and free Wi-Fi, ensure a satisfying stay in Mai Khao. The property offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a beauty centre and a kids club. Villas at Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas feature a rain shower, a complimentary fruit bowl and a coffee maker. All are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a marble bathroom and an iPod docking station. They also have a private garden, luxury linen and a pillow menu. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Sirinat National Park, the property provides a selection of outdoor activities, such as fishing, canoeing and snorkeling. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mai Khao.Revato

name: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: This modern hotel in Thalang provides free wireless internet, as well as a butler service and a saltwater swimming pool. A swimming pool and a limousine service are just some of the deluxe amenities on offer to guests during their stay. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the pool bar. There is an in-house day spa to relax at, which features a beauty centre and a sauna, as well as a range of body treatments. The hotel also has its very own gym, Lakeside Pool. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. All offer an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a seating area. Guests of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ are invited to sample Thai and local cuisine at Dee Plee, or try Japanese dishes at Zuma Pop-up Restaurant. Room service is also available any time of the day. Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ offers free private parking on site for guests with a car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Thalang.Revato

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 22/2 Moo 4, Sakhu 83110
description: "Located just 12 minutes from Phuket International Airport, this Phuket resort commands panoramic views of the Andaman Sea, a peaceful paradise offering ultimate privacy. Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach Hotel is situated on Naithon Beach and surrounded by Sirinat National Park, a beautiful harmony of nature and 5-star luxuries. Lounge by one of our two pools, or pamper yourself at the hotel's award-winning Spa. Dine at our restaurants, bars and deli offering a fusion of Thai and Western cuisine. "accorhotels.com

name: Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection (SHA Plus+)
address: 138/21 Moo 4, Mai Khao 83110
description: Situated in Mai Khao, Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+ provides stylish 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a swimming pool and a sauna. The air-conditioned rooms feature plasma TVs and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the lounge bar. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. The hotel provides 22 rooms, each with a private balcony, a spa bath and slippers. Each has a bathroom that offers bathrobes and a hair dryer. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. Phuket International Airport is a 25-minute drive from Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+. Those wishing to explore the region can also visit Sa Khu, situated an easy drive from the property.Revato

name: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
address: 231 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Plan an unforgettable escape to our Phuket, Thailand beach hotel. JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is a 5-star, family-friendly resort just steps from Mai Khao Beach. From our beachfront resort in Phuket, Thailand, enjoy easy access to the islands of Phang Nga Bay, Old Town Phuket and the Royal Phuket Marina. Resort guests are treated to an award-winning spa, three outdoor pools, a modern fitness center and activities such as Thai cooking classes. Plan your special occasion in our beachfront hotel in Phuket, Thailand's indoor and outdoor venues with advanced technology, custom catering and dedicated event planners. Relax in family-friendly hotel rooms, suites and villas filled with five-star amenities like plush bedding, marble bathrooms, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and outdoor space overlooking tropical gardens or the ocean. Select resort rooms have whirlpool tubs, extra living space and private pools. Create lasting memories at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa in Thailand.Marriott

name: V Villas Phuket - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
address: Moo 8 Ao Yon Road Vichit Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Located 39 metres above pristine and secluded Ao Yon Bay and immersed into nature, an exclusive pool villas resort with 24 hours butler service, European and Thai Coastal cuisine, world-class rooftop bar with panoramic view as well as Spa & wellness program. V Villas Phuket offers guest unparalleled privacy and indulgence.accorhotels.com

name: The Slate (Sha Plus+)
address: 116 Moo 1 Tambol Sakhu, Talang, Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: The Slate, Phuket presents industrial chic design set against the beautiful natural backdrop of Nai Yang Beach and Andaman Sea. Offering beachfront rooms, it also has a rainforest spa and 3 outdoor pools, one is open for family while the other 2 pools are for adults only. Uniquely decorated with original art pieces and locally crafted furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms feature rich wood and cool stone accents. A flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and bottled water are included in all rooms. The Slate, Phuket is just 5 minutes' drive from Phuket International Airport. It is a 10-minute drive from Blue Canyon Golf Course and Mission Hills Golf Club. Coqoon Spa offers ultimate relaxation with body massage and facials in The Nest, a private treatment room suspended mid-air like a bird nest. For a refreshing workout, the fitness centre provides yoga, pilates and Muay Thai classes. Guests may experience the charm of Thailand with the hotel's Thai cooking classes, language lessons and Weekend Market day trips. There is also a dive centre and kitesurfing centre next to the hotel. Five dining options leave guests spoilt for choice, serving everything from a breakfast buffet to fresh seafood barbecue dinners. Tongkah Tin Syndicate provides a snooker hall and international whiskeys.

name: Pullman Phuket Panwa Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 44/5 Moo 8 Sakdidesh Road, Wichit 83000
description: Nestled on the picturesque shores of Markham Bay, the resort offers sweeping views of the Andaman Sea. With the airport just 45 minutes away and 20 minute-drive to Phuket Town, the hotel is ideally located to explore the many attractions on Phuket island.accorhotels.com

name: My Beach Resort Phuket
address: 105 Aow Yon Road, Moo 8, Panwa Cape, Wichit 83000
description: My Beach Resort Phuket is situated on Phuket, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a sun deck and an outdoor pool. The resort provides a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. Amenities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, slippers, a flat-screen TV and a private balcony. They each offer a telephone, a seating area and an in-room safe. Guests staying at My Beach Resort Phuket can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close by when looking to sit down to a meal. In the evening, guests can wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. My Beach Resort Phuket provides an ideal place to explore Kata Beach and Chalong Bay, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Phuket Town and Patong are also a short drive away.Revato

name: SAii Laguna Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: Laguna Phuket, 323 Moo 2, Choeng Thale 83110
description: SAii Laguna Phuket is located on Bangtao Beach. It offers rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. The resort is an outdoor pool and fitness centre. A kid’s club and babysitting service are available. The property is a 20-minute drive to Patong Beach and Phuket International Airport. It is a 25-minute drive to Phuket Town. For Club, Suite and Villa room types, Club Lounge Access with VIP check-in, gourmet breakfast and afternoon snack, happy hour with beer and wine including chef's tasting menu is included. Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. It also has a coffee maker and a hairdryer. A bathtub is included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can arrange daytrips at the tour desk while staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with luggage storage and shuttle service. The hotel is equipped with a business centre and meeting facilities.

name: The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 32 Moo 5, Phuket City 83110
description: Escape to a hidden paradise. The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket is tucked off the east coast of Thailand and offers unsurpassed privacy in the Andaman Sea as the only property on Phuket Island. Journey to our oceanfront beach resort in Phuket by a short speedboat ride and immerse in enchanting coconut groves, beaches and limestone cliffs. Unwind with a cocktail at waterfront Z Bar or the unexpected flavors at our three beachside restaurants. Luxuriate at Spa Naka with a revitalizing massage, facial or wellness service, and stay active with daily hotel happenings, eco-friendly experiences such as planting mangrove trees or fitness center with Technogym® equipment. In your hotel room, suite or villa, discover the same level of refinement and attention to detail. Accommodations are distinct and radiant, boasting scenic views of the garden, sea, beach or terrace. Together with our vacation packages, curate an unforgettable stay at The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket.Marriott

name: Mövenpick Resort Bangtao Beach Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 35 Moo 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Here the best of classic Thai and contemporary designs blends in 40 inviting residences. Our bright and breezy accommodation offers living and dining areas, fully-equipped kitchens and over-sized balconies for the ultimate blissful experience. Located a few steps away from Bangtao Beach, this exclusive luxury resort of penthouses and suites treats you to unparalleled relaxation. Experience soothing treatments at Blossom Spa, relax in the pool, or walk along the endless, white Thai sands of Bangtao Beachaccorhotels.com

name: Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 6/2 Moo6, Nakalay Bay, Kamala 83150
description: Featuring a private beach, a sauna and a swimming pool, Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Chann Wellness Spa and Lagoon Swimming Pool. There are a variety of facilities at the resort, including complimentary wireless internet and free private parking on site. It offers family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as a kids club and a kids pool. It also features a sun deck with impressive pool, sea and garden views. Offering 5-star accommodation, the rooms at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ feature a private balcony. They are air conditioned and offer a mini bar, slippers and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+'s on-site restaurants, then later experience international, Thai and Chinese meals at Marisa Terrace or international cuisine at Thai Sala Cafe. The resort is a convenient place to discover nearby Patong Beach and Kamala Beach. Patong and Phuket Town are located a short drive away.Revato

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
address: 27, 27/2 Mu 8, Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.

name: Rosewood Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 88/28 Muen-Ngern Road, Tri-Trang Beach, Patong 83150
description: Located in Tri Trang Beach in Phuket, Rosewood Phuket features an outdoor pool and water sports facilities. The resort boasts views of the sea, and guests can enjoy contemporary dining experiences at an Italian inspired restaurant. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for cycling. Emerald Bay are 600 metres from Rosewood Phuket, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from Rosewood Phuket.

name: Varana Hotel Krabi
address: 258 Moo 3 Tambol Nongtalay Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180
description: No description found

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
address: 396-396/1 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Set in Ao Nang, this traditional hotel provides a swimming pool, a sauna and a private beach. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a range of facilities available to guests of Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi, including fitness classes, a kids club and free Wi-Fi. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, airport shuttle and business centre, babysitting services and children's play area, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The comfortable rooms at Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi include a private balcony, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. There are also a number of rooms especially designed for families. A cooked breakfast is available at Lotus Court and Suan Bua every morning before guests venture off to sightsee in the local area. For guests on the go, Hagi offers breakfast, or for those travelling at a more leisurely pace, COAST Beach Club & Bistro serves a sit-down lunch. A wide variety of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi is surrounded by the area's popular sightseeing attractions, including Ao Phra Nang, which is a short walk away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Zeavola Resort
address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Krabi 83000
description: Zeavola is the definition of barefoot luxury and one of the most sustainable hotels in Thailand: This charming retreat is a jungle resort and themed to be a Thai Village from over 30 years ago, without missing all the amenities and services of a typical 5 Star Hotel. Grass-roofed teakwood villas blend with traditional Thai influences and a charming feel rustic. You won't find golden faucets and white marble here. Together with the tropical jungle, its sand paths, and the authentic Zeavolians is what will spark the magic. Zeavola is located on Phi Phi Don’s northeast coast and is only reachable by boat. Away from the hustle and bustle of Tonsai, the main village, and pier of Phi Phi Islands. There are no streets, cars, or motorbikes. Zeavola’s, Zann Zanook Activity, and 5 Star Padi Dive center offer professional diving. They also guided island-hopping and snorkeling tours. The Activity Center provides complimentary sports equipment so guests can play volleyball or frisbee on the beach or enjoy free kayaks. Before booking, ensure that your flights are in line with our boat transfers. The resort recommends that international travelers plan a day before and after departure on the mainland. This will help to ease your travel stress and any weather-related timeline changes. Insider Tip: Stay a minimum of two nights to get the feel and the understanding of what the Zeavola is trying to create What to bring: Mosquito spray, sun blocker, your positive energy For more information, please visit our official website or contact us directly. Emails and messages on online platforms will be replied to within 24 hours. In urgent matters call +66 75 627 000

name: Rayavadee
address: 214 Moo 2, Tumbon Ao-Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Luxurious beachfront accommodation along Krabi's Andaman Coast is provided at the 5-star Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus, just next to Krabi Marine National Park. It has a full-service spa, 4 dining options and an outdoor pool. Surrounded on all sides by tropical gardens and beaches, Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus features free-standing 2-storey pavilions and beachfront pool villas. Each room has a terrace, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Via speedboat, Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus is a 25-minute journey from Bamboo Island and a 35-minute journey from Phi Phi Island. It is less than 2 hours’ driving from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy the resort’s natural setting, which is home to wildlife like monkeys and exotic birds. Massages, facial and body treatments are available at The Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus Spa. Designer items and souvenirs are available at Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus Boutique. Fresh lobster and Western dishes are served at the Raya Dining Restaurant, while Krua Phranang offers traditional Thai fare. Raitalay Terrace features international dishes and views of Railay Beach.

name: The Elements Krabi Resort
address: 189 Moo 3, Klong Muang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Located beside Klong Muang Beach, Elements Krabi Resort offers 4-star rooms with air conditioning and private balconies. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool and sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available. The Elements Krabi Resort - SHA Plus has well-appointed rooms with tea and coffee makers, satellite TVs and bathrobes. Room service is available. The Sea-Breeze Restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. It serves a mix of Thai cuisine and international dishes. Meals can be enjoyed outside while overlooking the turquoise swimming pool. Elements Resort Krabi is situated approximately 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach, the Princess Lagoon and Phra Nang Cave. It is also located approximately 37 km from Krabi International Airport and an airport shuttle can be arranged by request.

name: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort
address: 155 Moo 2, Nong Thale, Krabi 81180
description: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offers a modern setting while in Krabi. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort boasts luxurious amenities, including a limousine service and Spa Krabi. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The rooms at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offer a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a kitchenette. Those staying at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort can indulge in a drink at Cocovida Pool Bar, before savouring a meal at Mangosteen’s. Places to dine at the resort include Toh Kin Khaw and Limoncello Italian Restaurant. Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort is within walking distance of Khlong Muang Beach. Ao Phra Nang and Tup Kaek Beach are within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort
address: 146 Moo 3, Nongthale, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Located along Tubkaek Beach, Anyavee Beach Resort offers rooms and villas with views of Ao Nang Bay from the balcony. It also features a swimming pool and beachfront restaurant. Rooms at Anyavee Tubkaek are decorated in a modern Asian design. Offering an LCD TV, they also have a coffee/tea maker, minibar and large bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can have a refreshing swim in the pool, which also has an attached children's pool. To relax, massage services are available. Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort- SHA Plus is a 40-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. The tourist centre of Ao Nang Beach is just 20 minute drive away. Half and full day tour arrangements can be made at Anyavee, along with car rentals. Free private parking is offered.

name: The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort
address: 123 Moo 3, Tubkaak Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Nestled within abundant greenery, The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers beachfront accommodation on Tubkaak Beach. Offering spacious rooms, it also features a full-service spa and an outdoor pool. Tubkaak Boutique Resort’s rooms feature wooden interiors, giving them a cosy feel. Guests can sit and enjoy mountain views from the balcony. Each room has an outdoor, tropical-style bathroom. With oversized armchairs and a collection of books and magazines, the library is great for quiet reading. Sun loungers are provided on the beach and by the pool. The resort also offers tour arrangements and cooking classes. The Arundina restaurant serves Thai and European dishes. Surrounded by water lily ponds, it boasts a relaxing atmosphere with ocean views. Private meals on the beach can also be arranged, while drinks are available at the library’s bar. The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach. Krabi Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Krabi Resort
address: 232 Moo 2 Ao Nang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Located on Ao Nang Beach, Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus provides direct beach access and charming rooms with private terraces. It has a large outdoor pool and a restaurant offering beautiful sea views. Conveniently situated near Krabi’s spectacular diving sites and limestone cliffs, The Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus is also just 4 km from Phra Nang Cave. It takes 30 minutes by car from the hotel to Krabi International Airport. Fitted with fine furnishings, rooms present a traditional Thai decor or contemporary designs. Each room has a cable TV, a minibar and ample seating space. Most rooms come with a luxurious bathtub. Recreation facilities include rock climbing, scuba diving and snorkelling. The resort also provides tour services, airport transfers and wireless internet access for a fee. The Boat, the resort’s all-day dining restaurant, serves Thai and international cuisine. Fresh seafood barbeque dishes are also available. Guests can enjoy refreshing beverages at the Beach and Pool Bar.

name: Amari Vogue Krabi
address: 149 Moo 3 Tubkaak Beach Nong Thale, Krabi 81000
description: The exclusive Amari Vogue Krabi offers a private beachfront along Tub Kaek Beach. Personalised service starts with a welcome drink at check-in. Beautiful rooms are fitted with polished wooden flooring, traditional Northern Thai artwork and carvings, as well as free internet. Luxuriously furnished, each room has a satellite TV, DVD player and minibar. Amari Vogue Krabi is a 20-minute drive from Aonang Beach and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi Airport is about 40 minutes' away by car. Guests can enjoy total relaxation at Breeze Spa with private steam rooms, massages and beauty treatments. Wellness facilities include a fitness room and spa baths. International cuisine is served at the Lotus Restaurant. Marcos Restaurant and Bar offers Mediterranean and Asian cuisines. Drinks and snacks are available at the Voyager Lounge.

name: Beyond Krabi
address: 98 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Inspired by nature, the luxurious Beyond Krabi offers a tropical escape on a private stretch of Klong Muang Beach. With an outdoor pool, it also has a fitness centre and restaurant. Featuring relaxed yet modern Thai design, air-conditioned rooms enjoy beautiful views of the gardens, pool or sea. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have hot showers and a hairdryer. Guests can indulge in a relaxing Thai body massage, or arrange day trips at the tour desk. Currency exchange and ticketing services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Thai and international cuisines are served at the hotel's restaurant. A daily breakfast buffet is also offered. Beyond Krabi is 7 km from Ao Nang Beach and 11 km from Railay Beach. It is a 45-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Free parking is available.

name: The L Resort
address: 31 Moo 2 - Ao Nang Beach, Ao Nang 81000
description: The L Resort is located in the Ao Nang Beach area of Krabi. The eco-friendly resort features cushioned sun loungers on the terrace and a large outdoor pool with a waterfall. It is just a 40-minute drive from Krabi Airport. The chic and non-smoking units are decorated with bright colours and feature white linens on the beds. A 40-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are offered in all air-conditioned rooms. The 4-star resort offers free Wi-Fi access and room service from 07:00-23:00 hrs. On-site, private parking is available free of charge. Day excursions can be arranged for guests as well. The Thai-Swiss restaurant, Wanna's Place serves a great selection of Thai and international dishes as well as Swiss cuisine.

name: Arawan Krabi Beach Resort
address: 107, Moo 5, Ao Nam Mao, Ao Nang 81000
description: Boasting views of the Andaman sea and limestone cliffs, Arawan Krabi Resort features outdoor swimming pools overlooking a private beach of Ao Nam Mao. Ao Nang beach is only a 12-minute drive away from the resort. Guests are also offered with complimentary shuttle services by Tuk Tuk. Featuring air conditioning, rooms at Arawan Krabi Resort are spacious and and fully equipped with flat screen satellite TVs and a seating area. En suite bathrooms include refreshing showers, toiletries and slippers. Guests can enjoy on-site restaurants serving Thai cuisines. There is an on-site free parking and bike rental available. Koh Phi Phi Don is 32 km from Arawan Krabi Beach Resort,while Railay Beach is 17 km away. The resort is only a 45-minute drive from Krabi International Airport.

name: U Samui
address: 86 Moo 4 Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Bo Phut, U Samui is an easy drive from Chaweng and offers a concierge, a 24-hour reception and a swimming pool. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. A dry cleaning service, a laundry service and 24-hour security are just some of the available services at the resort. A fitness centre is available to guests wanting to keep active while away. Rooms at U Samui feature mini bars, rain showers and tea and coffee making facilities. All offer an in-room safe, a desk and slippers. Guests staying at the resort can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. A daily breakfast is also available to those staying at the property. U Samui is within walking distance of Wat Phra Yai. Chaweng Beach is a short drive away.Revato

name: Hyatt Regency Koh Samui
address: 99/11 Moo 5, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in Chaweng, 1.9 km from Choeng Mon Beach, Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms include a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher. At Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Chaweng, like snorkelling and canoeing. Chaweng Beach is 2.5 km from Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus, while Big Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ampersand Resort
address: 9/132 Moo 5 Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Bophut, 500 metres from Thongson Bay Beach, Ampersand Resort offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ampersand Resort all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Middle Eastern cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for canoeing and cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star resort. Plai Laem Beach is 500 metres from Ampersand Resort, while Naturism Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 4 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa
address: 208/1 Moo 4, T. Maret, Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Relax in a boutique resort by the beach where five-star service and opulent amenities abound. Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa is set amidst manicured gardens, nestled along the shores of Koh Samui Island. Our hotel's prime location places you steps away from Lamai Beach, Chaweng Beach and Fisherman's Village. After a day on the beach in Thailand, rest well in an elegant hotel room with plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi and outdoor whirlpool. Or select one of our resort's lavish villas, each featuring a private pool. Satisfy your hunger at our delicious hotel restaurants with classic dishes from Thailand, locally sourced seafood or tasty international fare. Stay fit in Koh Samui with a workout in our fitness center or recharge with a swim in our hotel pools or a gentle massage at Quan Spa. If you're planning an event in Thailand, take advantage of stylish venues supported by on-site catering. We look forward to making your visit to Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa a memorable one.Marriott

name: Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club
address: 209 Sala Koy Road Bophut Koh Samui, Koh Samui
description: A stay at Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club places you in the heart of Koh Samui, a 1-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and 6 minutes from Chaweng Noi Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: W Koh Samui
address: 4/1 Moo 1, Tambol Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Savor boundless tranquillity by day. Then, ramp it up at night. Situated on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the middle of the Gulf of Thailand, overlooking stunning beaches and lush forests, W Koh Samui resort awakens as the sun goes down, igniting the unexpected. Life is done right. Hotel guests can start the day at our Koh Samui resort with a workout at FIT or dip at WET before unwinding with a locally inspired therapy at AWAY Spa. Then light up the evening with signature cocktails at WOOBAR and dinner at our hotel's on-site restaurants, Namu and The Kitchen Table. Surrounded by verdant foliage, each of our resort's 74 luxury, pet-friendly villas boasts a private outdoor pool and infinite island views. Inside, premiere technology meets signature W pillow top beds, Away Spa amenities and Whatever/Whenever service. Relax and take it easy in Thailand at W Koh Samui Hotel.Marriott

name: Vana Belle, a Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui
address: 9/99 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical forests, mythical gardens, crystal clear blue ocean water and pristine white sand beach. Vana Belle, A Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui is located at Chaweng Noi Beach. This Koh Samui hotel is moments away from attractions such as the Elephant Sanctuary, Wat Phra Yai, and Chaweng Beach. Discover the unsurpassed services, unrivaled location and comfort of our Koh Samui, Thailand, resort. Each of our suites and villas boasts private pools. Bring to light the luxurious rooms that feature signature Luxury Collection Bed and pillows, remarkable marble bathrooms and extra amenities. Unwind by the infinity-edge pool at the beachfront with the pool bar or experience the authentic Southern Thai cuisine at Panali or tasteful international cuisine at Kiree. Complete the holiday at Vana Spa with a Spa treatment featuring our signature Siam Boran massage.Marriott

name: Moët Boutique Resort
address: 7/1 Moo5 Bo Put, Koh Samui 84320
description: No description found

name: Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui
address: 65/10 Moo 5 Baan Tai, Koh Samui 84330
description: The luxurious Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui offers a 5-star tropical getaway in Ko Samui, with its very own beachfront, beautiful sea view infinity pool, and pampering spa services. Overlooking Ban Tai Beach, it has 4 dining options. Spacious air-conditioned villas feature modern Thai decor and large patios with views of the sea. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, each has a DVD player, TV and a Thai-style sofa. En suite bathrooms present a terazzo bathtub and rainshower. Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui is located along Mae Nam Beach and is about 25 minutes' drive from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. Guests can take PADI-certified diving and snorkelling lessons, or even take part in elephant trekking tours. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive away. Boasting 180° views of the ocean, as well as outdoor seating, Lai Thai Restaurant serves authentic Thai cuisine all day. Fresh seafood barbecue and international dishes are offered at the casual Beach Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at the 2 bars.

name: Banyan Tree Samui
address: 99/9 Moo 4 Maret Koh Samui, Koh Samui
description: Overlooking the sapphire waters of scenic Lamai Bay, Banyan Tree Samui is nestled in a series of cascading terraces on a private cove on the Southeastern coast of Koh Samui. The luxury all-pool villa resort combines the best elements of a tropical getaway with a pristine beach, blissful spa escapes, bespoke dining experiences, locally-infused elements and an unparalleled view of the Gulf of Thailand.accorhotels.com

name: Silavadee Pool Spa Resort
address: 208/66 Moo4, Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: Set upon a hill in Koh Samui, Silavadee Pool Spa Resort enjoys a private beach and an outdoor infinity pool. Aside from free WiFi, it also has a free DVD library. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, Silavadee Resort offers free shuttle services to Lamai and Chaweng. Samui Airport is about 9 km from the resort. Spacious and decked with luxurious teak wood furnishings, the Thai-style rooms feature modern amenities like a flat-screen TV, iPod dock and minibar. En suite bathrooms are equipped with bathtubs and hairdryers. The peaceful Silavadee Wellness Spa has a relaxing menu of massage treatments and beauty therapies. The resort also arranges a business centre and laundry services. Fresh seafood, traditional Thai and international dishes are served at The Height Restaurant, which has open-air seating overlooking stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand. The pool has a bar offering cocktails and fruit juices.The Moon Restaurant provides all guests with all day dining, serving varieties of International and Mediterranean dinner a la carte.

name: Samui Resotel Beach Resort
address: 17 Moo 3 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Sitting on the white sands of Chaweng Beach, the breathtaking Samui Resotel Beach Resort offers beautiful accommodation with ocean or tropical garden views. It is a 15-minute drive from the airport. Soak up the sun on your private terrace complete with daybeds, or relax with a DVD on the flat-screen TV. All rooms and villas at Samui Resotel are equipped with a tea/coffee machine and high-speed internet access. Lazy afternoons by the pool and indulgent massages await guests at Samui Resotel. There is also a well-equipped gym and a dive centre. Capriccio Restaurant offers authentic Italian and Thai dishes, and a great selection of wines. Samui Resotel Beach Resort also has 3 bars where guests can enjoy refreshing beverages. Room service is available. The resort offers car rental facilities, as well as, a tour desk which organises day trips and island exploration excursions. The Thai Boxing Stadium is about 1.2 km from the hotel.

name: Santiburi Koh Samui
address: 12/12 Moo 1 Mae Nam Beach, Koh Samui 84330
