name: Grand Oasis Palm
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 4.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Grand Oasis Palm is everything you want in a family vacation. We will play with the little ones while you take a break, we have lots of ways for grown ups to relax while kids have fun. Located in the hotel zone, by the beach, 200 m from ferry dock, 4 km from a golf course, 5 km from Cancun center and 21 km from Cancún international airport. Facilities and services include restaurants, bars, swimming pool, children's pool, mini club, children's playground, gym, tennis court (extra charge), spa (extra charge), wireless Internet access (extra charge), meeting/conference room, parking, elevator and 24-hour reception. Rooms feature telephone, TV, safe (extra charge), air conditioning, wireless Internet access (extra charge), hairdryer and bathroom. Address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5 Sección C Lote 1, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancun, Quintana Roo, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Emporio Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Retorno Gucumatz Km 17 L49 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout and accommodation with terraces and views of the Caribbean Sea, Emporio Cancun is set on the beach in Cancún’s Hotel Zone. It has a picturesque setting between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupté Lagoon. Each air-conditioned room and suite has bright décor and tiled flooring. All accommodation at the Emporio Cancun has cable TV. Suites also come with a kitchen and a dining and seating area. San Miguelito Archaeological Site and the Cancún Maya Museum are located in front of the hotel.

name: Dreams Sapphire Resort & Spa
address: Super Manzana 11, Manzana 9, Lote 10, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun, Gourmet All Inclusive by Karisma
address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Cancun Bay Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With breathtaking views of Mujeres Bay, Cancun Bay Resort features a beachfront pool and relaxation pool, tennis courts and a hot tub with a bar. It is located near several of Cancun's restaurants, shops and entertainment venues. Cancun International Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and Cancun's commercial area can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Each room and suite at the resort has a private balcony or terrace with views of the lagoon, garden or sea.FarePortal

name: Hotel Marina El Cid Spa
address: Boulevard el Cid Unidad 15, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This Quintana Roo hotel overlooks the Puerto Morelos National Reef Park. It features a full-service spa, full-service marina, a 22,000 square foot pool and an on-site travel company. Each suite at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort Cancun Riviera Maya is furnished with a minibar, coffee maker and provides satellite TV. Guests will also find a hairdryer, ironing facilities and a work desk in each suite. Four restaurants are available at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort. Mediterranean, casual international, Mexican and seafood dishes are offered at the hotel. The Hotel Marina Beach Resort contains a convention center and a gym. The outdoor pool features water slides and rock formations. An adults-only pool is also on site. El Cid Spa Hotel Marina & Beach Resort is less than one mile from the charming, bohemian fishing village of Puerto Morelos. It is 30 minutes from Playa del Carmen.

name: Bel Air Collection Resort & Spa Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This award-winning hotel is situated in a major world-renowned tourist destination, Cancun, in southeastern Mexico. Guests will find a host of tourist attractions close to the property, such as El Rey ruins and Chicen Itza, a large pre-Columbian city built by Maya. It also enjoys a unique situation close to some shopping and entertainment venues in the area. Cancun International Airport is some 12 kilometres away. Ideal for business and leisure travellers alike, this exclusive resort offers all the necessary services and amenities to rest and relax in this stunning region. The guest rooms provide breathtaking views over the ocean or the lake as well as an ultra-plush duvet for guests' convenience. A wide range of on-site dining options is offered for guests to enjoy a unique culinary experience. From international fusion cuisine to regional specialities, travellers will find a host of tempting dishes.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Seadust Cancun Family Resort
address: Boulevard Kululcan Km 17 Lote 52 04, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Ocean View Cancun Arenas
address: Blvd Kukulkan Km 2.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Steps from the beach, in Cancun's Hotel Zone, surrounded by gardens, nightclubs and restaurants, this hotel offers many meal options with 3 on-site restaurants and has free wireless internet access. Ocean View Cancun Arenas features an outdoor pool with daily activities and nightly entertainment. Guests can relax with a drink from the poolside snack bar or workout in the fitness center. After a day spent at the beach, visitors can relax on their private balcony or terrace. Guests at the Cancun Arenas Holiday Inn will appreciate a variety of restaurant options ranging from casual to fine dining. Arenas buffet-style restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Visitors can choose from beachfront dinning in Ocean Grill Tequila or fine Italian cuisine in Diletto.

name: Dreams Jade Resort & Spa
address: Unidad 26, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set right on a stunning sandy beach and surrounded by a beautiful landscape of crystal blue waters, this spectacular holiday resort offers a unique experience of complete luxury on the Mexican coast. The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

name: Alaya Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum Boca Paila Km 8.3, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located in the beach-side of Tulum, Alaya Tulum by Ahau features an on-site restaurant. The property has a special terrace to practice yoga and a private beach area with sun beds for the guests to use. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature a terrace. The full bathroom has a shower and includes free toiletries. A sofa, iPod dock and a safe that fits a laptop are some of the amenities also available. At Alaya Tulum by Ahau you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities featured at the property include a tour desk. Free parking is offered on site. Tulum Archaeological Site can be reached in a 15-minute drive, while the Gran Cenote Site is 12 km away. Cancun can be reached in 1 hour and 30 minutes by car, while Playa del Carmen is 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Ana Y Jose Hotel & Spa Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum Boca Paila Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in tropical gardens, this hotel offers an outdoor pool, a spa and direct beach access. Each spacious, air-conditioned suite includes free Wi-Fi and views of the gardens or sea. Ana y Jose Charming Hotel & Spa is situated on Tulum Beach, a 5-minute drive from Tulum’s ancient Maya ruins. It is located on the edge of the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve. The hotel’s stylish suites have typical Mexican décor. Each suite has a furnished terrace, a seating area, minibar and safety deposit box. Bathrooms include amenities and a hairdryer. The restaurant serves Mexican cuisine made with local produce, including freshly caught fish. Guests can also enjoy the sea views and sunsets from the terrace bar. Staff at the Ana y Jose’s 24-hour reception can organize a range of excursions and activites. These include visits to Mayan temples, trekking in the rainforest, diving courses or fishing trips.

name: Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Boca Paila Km6.5, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a garden, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, every room includes a desk. The rooms include a coffee machine, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature sea views. At Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 84 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Tulum
address: Crta Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, free WiFi access, and a spa, Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive is located in Akumal, Mexico. A flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, and alarm clock are included in each room. A minibar, refrigerator, and coffee machine are also furnished. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in all private bathrooms. A tennis court and fitness centre are featured at the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive as well as 9 bars and 4 restaurants. A waterpark, nightclub, and adjacent casino are also available for guests to enjoy. Aktun Chen Natural Park is 4.4 km from the hotel, Xcacel Beach is 9.7 km away, and Xel-Há Park is 11 minutes' drive away from the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive.

name: The Beach Tulum
address: Road Tulum-Boca Paila km7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The adults-only The Beach Tulum Hotel offers a beautiful setting on Tulum Beach within 7 km of its famous Mayan Ruins. It features beach-front rooms with terraces and lounge area, an outdoor pool, beach club and a restaurant. Onsite Spa and onsite shop. Each luxurious, beach-front room has stylish, minimalist décor. Each air-conditioned accommodation includes free WiFi and a seating area. Guests can enjoy full breakfast either in the Ziggy's restaurant or Fresco's. Ziggy's Beach Club serves drinks and snacks from 09:00 until sunset. Tulum National Park is less than 4 km from the hotel, while the town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away. Cancún is within 140 km away and Playa del Carmen is within 60 km away.

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Akumal
address: Carretera Chetumal Benito Juarez KM 250, 77719 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and beside a kilometre-long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. the center of Akumal is about 3.5 km away offering a range of shops and entertainment. The turist area of Tulum is about 15 km. Playa del Carmen is 35 km away. Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Both Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 km or within around half an hour of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka'an - Adult Only Hotel
address: Km 250 Carr Federal a Chetumal, 77729 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive is located in the Riviera Maya town of Akumal. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. The accommodation will provide you with air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath and a hairdryer. Extras include a seating area. At Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive you will find a tennis court and a fitness centre Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Xcacel-Xcacelito (5.5 km) and Kantenah Bay (23 km). This resort is 95 km from Cancún International Airport.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Coba
address: Carretera Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and besides a 1 km long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. The center of Akumal is some 3.5 km away and offers a range of shops and numerous restaurants, bars, cafes, and other entertainment venues. The toursitic zone of Tulum is 15 km from the hotel. Playa del Carmen is 35 min away and Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 - 30 min of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Casa Malca
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 9.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service. name: Ahau Tulum
address: Carr. Tulum a Boca Paila Km. 7.5, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Ahau Tulum is an eco-friendly and pet-friendly property that offers free Wi-Fi connection, yoga lessons and massage services for a fee. It features solar and wind panels for heating and a rain catch system to recycle the water. The suites have mosquito nets and fans, plus views of the Caribbean Sea are available. Bathrobes and iPod dockings are some of the amenities they offer, along with furnished terraces. The bathroom has a shower. The restaurant at Ahau Tulum serves international cuisine. Tulum’s beach is just a few metres from the property, which also has a shared lounge area, laundry and ironing services. Tulum Archaeological Site can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and Tulum is 8.9 km away.

name: Hotel Cabañas Tulum Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Carretera Cancun-Tulum Bocapalia Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located on one of the nicest beaches in Tulum, Mexico. The hotel offers a secluded location, guest rooms with free WiFi, an on-site restaurant and the Ziggy's Beach Club. Rooms at Cabanas Tulum include hammocks on the private terrace. Some rooms are located directly on the beach. Some rooms feature a private rooftop terrace with hot tub. Fresco's offers international cuisine and has children menu. Hotel guests can enjoy the beach club amenities, as well as cocktails and beers. The bilingual staff at Cabanas Tulum can arrange tours to nearby eco-friendly attractions like Sian Ka'an, a natural biosphere, or tours to sightseeing the cenotes, the natural underground pools, or travel to the archaeological sites nearby including Cobá, Chichen Itza and Ek Balam. Cabanas Tulum has Naj Naay Spa. Our guests minimum age is 14 years.

name: Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort
address: Km 104 Carr. Cancun-Chetumal, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Located on Akumal Bay, this 4-star beach resort is only a 20-minute drive to Tulum. This resort features 2 beach-side pools and 3 restaurants serving international cuisine. Every room at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort offers a full ocean view and a private balcony or terrace. The air conditioned rooms offer color TV and an in-room safety deposit box. On-site activities at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort include fitness classes, beach volleyball and snorkelling. A Kid’s Club provides supervised fun activities for children. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the Pool Bar. Downtown Akumal is within walking distance of the resort and Cancun is within an hours’ drive.

name: Lula Tulum
address: Km 8.2 Carretera Boca Paila, 77790 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Designed to accommodate, Sanar was created with options for intimate relaxation or social interactions with like minded individuals. In 2017 Sanara Tulum was selected #3 in the 150 Greatest Hotels in the world by Harpers Bazaar. The hotel also won the 2015 National Competition in the category of Architecture and Interiors for Hotels from the Asociacion de Arquitectos e Interioristas, Mexico. A space that harmonizes with the beauty of its surroundings. The sleek and simple architecture is nestled in-between wildly sprouting Coconut Palms and Mayan Cheet trees while the ocean provides ample breeze and the serenading sounds of crashing waves.Lula 19 AC rooms, suites and villas, Wellness Center, and Studio are built on the coveted white sand beaches of Tulum, Mexic. Overlooking the crystal clear turquoise sea, the curative boutique hotel offers both Beachside & Sanara Jungle Poolside rooms. Each Lula beach room offers a private balcony, luxurious bathroom, and wardrobe. Dressed with imported bamboo cotton from Italy, both the super king size and additional day bed make for the ultimate luxury in sleeping, and accommodate up to two or three people.The stunningly appointed Sanara Villa, situated in our beachside garden, has one opulent master suite downstairs with a large living room, and upstairs an additional 2 bedroom suite. The Villa can sleep up to 8 adults. +Our Jungle provides 4 gorgeous jungle rooms nestled around a private pool and waterfall, each with a King bed, air conditioning and private bathroom. In addition we offer a Jungle Villa with 2 Suites, each comprising of 1 spacious bedroom and 1 living room. Our Jungle villa also has a stunning Jungle roof terrace which delivers stunning sunsets over the canopy of trees. Sanara Jungle is very popular with groups and more economic travelers who wish to come and enjoy Sanara's stunning yoga facility, the acclaimed cuisine inside The Real Coconut, and of course the priceless Tulum beach. Our restaurant has become a global hit with people traveling just to eat with us. Created by Daniella Hunter, The Real Coconut's philosophy of eating is a regimen for sustainable living, both personally and for the planet. Built on the foundational belief that plants form the key to our vitality and that gut health and digestion are paramount to optimum well being, The Real Coconut is dedicated to all that is conscious living. Daniella integrates key elements of paleo, gluten & grain-free, and vegan diet practices, ultimately creating a menu that is universal without compromising taste. The Real coconut products are now sold in Whole Foods Markets, Costco and thousands of stores stores across the United States, Canada and EnglandThe menus are gluten free; grain free, dairy free; refined sugar free; soy free; and cashew freeIn a coconut shell.our philosophy is plant based food with options to include sustainably sourced animal proteins.The hotel also features one of the most stunning yoga studios on the planet, where Tulum's finest teachers provide three classes a day. And finally you can encounter "care" and "service" in the Sanara Wellness Center, which has also been consistently listed in top wellness lists in thew world, offering a comprehensive menu to help you take away any stress and support your total rejuvenation.iHotelier/iStay

name: Mereva Tulum
address: Frac. Tankah III No. Mza 3 Lote 35, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering Two outdoor pools and gourmet food, Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky is located 10 minutes' drive from Tulum town and 15 minutes’ drive from the Tulum Mayan Ruins. It has a private dock and offers kayaking and snorkelling, complimentary paddle board. The air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, an HDTV with satellite channels and a balcony with sea views. All with private bathrooms, most of them count with double rain shower, twin sinks and mirrors. A la carte American breakfast is included. At Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky you can enjoy romantic dinners or spa treatments with wonderful Caribbean Sea views on the 45-metre dock. The Manati Cenote is located right across from Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky. This Boutique Hotel is 10 minutes’ drive from Xel-Há Eco-Theme Park and 90-minutes’ drive from Cancún International Airport. Free parking is available on site.

name: Conrad Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Experience the magic of Tulum with views of the ocean from every room and suite, approximately a 2-hour drive from Cancun International Airport. Uncover your sense of wonder in our resort with five pools, 11 restaurants, and magnificent views. Our personalized concierge can help you unwind or fill your day with beach activities, spa treatments, and excursions to nearby attractions. Tulum is a Magical Town with an eco-chic atmosphere that provides a spiritual and relaxing sensation. Tulum city center, underwater caves, amusement parks, and more are all within 30 minutes. The ultimate place for an unplugged beach vacation, explore historic ruins and the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, as well as shops and restaurants. Enjoy beautiful white-sand beaches, lagoons, cenotes, and caverns that show the beauty of nature in all its splendor.Hilton

name: Grand Sirenis Riviera Maya Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Federal Cancún - Tulúm, Zona Costera, Km 256.3, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Overlooking the Caribbean Sea, Grand Sirenis Riviera Maya Resort & Spa is a modern hotel featuring 3 outdoor pools, a spa and a private beach area. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel’s stylish rooms offer spectacular garden and sea views and feature a separate seating area equipped with a flat-screen TV. The bathroom features a whirlpool tub and includes a bathrobe and slippers. Grand Riviera Maya offers a variety of dining options, including Mexican, Italian, Mediterranean, Brazilian, Thai, Japanese and French cuisine. There is also a poolside bar, coffee shop, several bars and an on-site souvenir shop. The property offers a dolphinarium with extra cost. Guests can relax in the gardens or enjoy a number of water sports including snorkelling, and kayaking. The Mexican-themed eco-archaeological park, Xcaret Park, is 26 km away. Playa del Carmen is 30 km away. There is an ATM machine at the resort and on-site parking is available.

name: Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 236.7 No.1, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Among acres of tropical gardens and jungle, Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa is located just minutes' from the ancient Mayan ruins and the trendy and bohemian town of Tulum. Dreams Tulum is a AAA Four Diamond award-winning resort, with all the benefits of Unlimited-Luxury® - where everything is included. Dreams Tulum’s magnificent Mexican colonial architecture blends tastefully with an up scale contemporary design where every room offers a private and furnished terrace or balcony, marble bathroom, daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Dreams Tulum also offers a secluded adults-only section and swim out suites for direct access to a pool. Additionally, there is a splash park for kids located near the Explorer’s Club. The pools are heated from December and March depending on climate conditions. Dreams Tulum sits on 2 miles of powdery white sand with activities to make the whole family happy including on-site watersports and dive shop, discounted greens fees at the nearby Riviera Maya Golf Club, an Explorer’s Club for Kids and a Core Zone Teens Club. The Dreams Spa by Pevonia® offers serene jungle and beach cabins, a spa pantry for guests to create their own spa products and a Temazcal for a traditional Mayan spa ceremony experience. With authentic and gourmet dining options, unlimited top-shelf spirits and nightly entertainment, guests can enjoy a Dream vacation at Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa.

name: Gardenia Collective
address: M27 L9 Calle Sol Oriente/ Escorpion Sur, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Gardenia Collective features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Tulum. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a shared lounge. With a private bathroom, some units at the hotel also feature a city view. Gardenia Collective offers an à la carte or American breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Tulum Bus station is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 77 km from Gardenia Collective, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hilton Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel facilities and services include air conditioning, free WiFi, car parking, gym/fitness facilities, spa facilities (extra charge), conference room, 24hr reception, restaurant, bar, swimming pool, kids pool, children playground and elevator. The room amenities include room service, air conditioning, free WiFi, safe box, TV, balcony/terrace, mini bar, coffee/tea maker, hairdryer and telephone. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions Address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, Tulkal Chemuyil, 77774, Tulum, Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Alea Tulum
address: Fracc Tankah III, Mza 3, Lte 28, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Alea Tulum offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a shared lounge. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel has a hot tub and evening entertainment. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature pool views. At Alea Tulum rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes à la carte, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Activities such as snorkelling, canoeing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Soliman Bay Beach is 2 km from Alea Tulum, while Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 70 km from the hotel.

name: Hotelito Azul
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km. 5.8, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, 6 km from Tulum Archeological Site, Hotelito Azul has a number of amenities including a private beach area and free WiFi. Open since 2017, this 4-star hotel is within 5 km of Parque Nacional Tulum and Cesiak. Guests can have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotelito Azul are equipped with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Hotelito Azul offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Tulum Bus station is 5 km from the hotel, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 67 km from Hotelito Azul.

name: Maya Tulum By G Hotels
address: Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila Km 7 Lote 10, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Tulum, 200 metres from South Tulum Beach, Maya Tulum By G Hotels provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Conveniently situated in the Zona Hotelera district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as an indoor pool. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Take in sweeping ocean views from a 620-acre reserve set on the shores of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula. The Pleiades constellation inspired the circular architecture of our resort's avant-garde exterior, which floats above the canopy of the mangrove trees below. Each of our 124 rooms, suites and residences boasts dramatic views, along with bespoke furniture and a private terrace or plunge pool. Reserve one of our vacation packages and revel in our resort's unique range of culinary destinations and other experiences.
