name: Grand Fiesta Americana Veracruz
address: Blvd Manuel Avila Camacho, 94299 Veracruz, Veracruz-Llave
description: Situated in a select area of Boca del Río, this luxurious hotel offers relaxing spa services and enjoyable on-site facilities, such as 2 gourmet restaurants, just minutes from the convention center. Rooms are air-conditioned and have a safety deposit box. All rooms also have private bathrooms. Grand Fiesta Americana Veracruz is beach-front and offers excellent views. Go swimming in the indoor or outdoor pools. After a busy day, aromatherapy treatment in the spa. Enjoy seafood, Italian at Arantzia Restaurant and Rosato Restaurant and have a drink at the snack bar and lobby bar. For casual dining in a vibrant atmosphere, stop by the hotel's cafe, where a daily continental breakfast is served.

name: Vivo Resorts
address: Avenida Vivo L 46-B, 71996 Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca
description: This luxurious property offers fully equipped, luxurious apartments located on a long stretch of pristine beach, just a 15-minute drive from Puerto Escondido. It has an 3 swimming pools with pool towels, a swim-up bar and views of the ocean. Each modern apartment at this property boasts breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and comes equipped with air conditioning, a kitchen and a satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. A courtesy coffee is offered. Dining options include Ernesto's and Coco Thai. Benefits include equipment for the tennis court, Pickle ball court, basketball court and table tennis. The property also offers complimentary recreation classes when available. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, you can explore Laguna Manialtepec, 5 km away, or Carrizalillo Beach which is 14 km from the property. Vivo Resorts also offers an airport shuttle service with an extra cost and free on-site parking.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa Mita
address: Comercial Camino Ingreso a Litibú, Lote 2, Higuera Blanca, Mexico, 63734 Punta de Mita, Nayarit
description: Iberostar Playa Mita offers accommodation in Punta Mita. Guests can enjoy 2 outdoor pools, a swim up bar and a water park. A variety of cocktails is available at each of the 8 different bars. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV, balcony and terrace. Some rooms have a seating area for your convenience and a coffee machine. Some units have ocean views and for your comfort, you will find bath robes and a hair dryer. High-speed internet is also available. You will find a 24-hour front desk and hairdresser at the property. There is also a fitness centre and library. At Iberostar Playa Mita guests can enjoy a wide variety of dishes in one of the 4 specialty restaurants as well as a buffet. Room service is available 24/7. You can play tennis at this resort, and the area is popular for windsurfing and other water activities. Rincon de Guayabitos is 37 km from Iberostar Playa Mita, while Puerto Vallarta is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 30 km from Iberostar Playa Mita.

name: Las Villas Hotel & Golf By Estrella del Mar
address: Camino Isla de la Piedra KM 10, 82267 Mazatlán, Sinaloa
description: This hotel offers access to a 3.5 mile long beach on the Pacific Ocean. Guests can relax at the full-service spa or work in their rooms with the free Wi-Fi. Estrella del Mar Resort Mazatlan features spacious rooms with views of the ocean or garden. The hotel features horse riding on the beach and a golf course. Guests can go for a swim in the outdoor pool or explore the beach. Dining options at the hotel include 4 restaurants and 3 bars. Guests can shop in the gift shop or stock their room at the convenience store. Estrella del Mar Resort Mazatlan is within a 30-minute drive of downtown Mazatlan. The Mazatlan International Airport is within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Grand Isla Navidad Resort
address: Circuito de Los Marinos, 28830 Manzanillo, Colima
description: This luxury beachfront resort, in Barra de Navidad, features a golf course, gym, spa and 2 outdoor pools, one located on the 10th floor. There are tennis courts and on-site water sports facilities. Free WiFi is included in public areas. Spacious air-conditioned rooms have a terrace with ocean, pool or mountain views. There is a living room with a sofa, cable TV and coffee maker. Rooms have a ceiling fan and private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Grand Isla Navidad Golf & Spa Resort with Marina offers several bars and restaurants. Room service is also available. There is free on-site parking and the hotel has 24-hour reception, as well as a tour desk and concierge service.

name: The Preluna Hotel
address: 124 Tower Road, Sliema SLM 1000
description: Set on Sliema’s seafront, Malta’s The Preluna Hotel features 4 restaurants, a free gym, and a private beach. The spacious rooms have modern décor, and some units offer views of the Mediterranean Sea. All rooms at the Preluna are air-conditioned and feature a tea/coffee maker, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with bath and shower. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The private beach area features a large swimming pool, a kids' pool, and a bar and grill. The Feelgood spa includes an indoor heated pool with hydromassage and a sauna. Massages and treatments can also be reserved. The restaurants are open for lunch and dinner. The Triton, the main restaurant with Mediterranean Sea views, is buffet style with international dishes and an open show kitchen. Breakfast is a generous hot and cold buffet. At the Skyroom Cocktail Bar & Grill guests can enjoy a drink or head to the sea-view open terrace for dinner.

name: Paradise Bay Resort
address: Cirkewwa Paradise Bay, Mellieha MLH 02
description: Featuring 3 outdoor pools, and spacious, sunbathing terraces, Paradise Bay Resort overlooks Paradise Bay on one side and the islands of Gozo and Comino on the other. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. The hotel features sea-view rooms with satellite TV, mini fridge, and tea/coffee making facilities. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A generous buffet-style continental breakfast is provided daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal at one of the 3 on-site restaurants. Lunch and dinner is in the form of a rich, Mediterranean buffet, with an à la carte menu also available. Paradise Hotel's private beach can be enjoyed during the summer. Water sports and scuba-diving courses with qualified instructors are available all year round. The heated indoor pool is open during cooler months. On requests, relaxing moments can be savoured in the hot tub and sauna, and discounts are available for on-site massages. A tennis court and a playground for children are also featured at the property. The hotel has a dedicated team of multi-lingual staff who are always happy to be of assistance. The Paradise Bay also has 4 meeting rooms, suitable for a maximum of 180 delegates. A nearby bus will offer you connections to Valletta and Malta International Airport, both within 30 km of the property. The hotel is also within walking distance of the Ferry Terminal to Gozo island. Mellieha beach is 3.5 km away.

name: Doubletree by Hilton Malta
address: Qawra, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 2402
description: Beautiful located at the waters edge, the Dolmen Hotel is the perfect retreat for an island holiday in Malta. Our hotel facilities include 488 guest rooms + suites, a variety of 7 restaurants & bars and 6 pools to choose from, an Inhouse Casino,state of the art conference facilities + meeting rooms, stunning wedding venues and Free WiFi so guests can stay connected throughout their stay. To ensure an utterly memorable vacation, take advantage of our spacious Amazonia Beach lido, 4 outdoor pools, kids' pool, PADI diving school and water sports centre. Indulge in a relaxing treatment at the Myoka leading Spa in Malta or reenergise in one of the two heated indoor pools, fitness room, hydro massage, and sauna. Animation activities are provided on a daily basis together with a kids club during the summer months and Daily entertainment is held during the evenings. As one of the best quality Malta hotels, the Dolmen Hotel also provides a multi-storey car park with over 400 car spaces. Discover the warmth of traditional Maltese hospitality, the flavours of authentic cuisine and the excitement of the Mediterranean – experience the vacation you deserve with the Dolmen Hotel.FarePortal

name: Radisson Blu Golden Sands Resort & Spa, Golden Bay
address: Golden Bay, Mlh 5510 Mellieha, Malta Mellieha, Mellieha MLH 5510
description: Set into the sandy coast of Malta's Golden Bay, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands includes a large swimming pool, a adult only pool and a children's pool. It also offers a private beach and a spa. Rooms are large and luxurious. Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands enjoys a quiet, private setting, with peaceful views of the sea and the surrounding countryside. It is a 10-minute drive from the harbour where ferries leave for Gozo Comino. The spa extends over 1000 m² of space, and the resort's Leisure Centre offers stunning views of the sea from its large windows overlooking the bay. Rooms are furnished with modern decorations and offer a balcony with sea or countryside views. During summer the rate includes 1 parasol and 2 sun loungers per room.

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St Julian's
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3391
description: Set on the seafront in St. George's Bay, this 5-star hotel offers central but quiet location in St.Julians. It features 3 outdoor pools, a heated indoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and a large balcony. Air-conditioned rooms at the Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St. Julian's all come with a TV, free tea and coffee making facilities as well as bottled water upon arrival. All rooms have views of the Mediterranean Sea. An appetizing selection of snacks, wines and cocktails are available at the Bridge Bar. A generous buffet breakfast is served daily at the Kontiki restaurant. The resort also features a touch of Mediterranean cuisine at Le Bistro and outdoor casual dining at The Edge. Public transport stop to the capital city Valletta and Hop-on Hop-Off Sightseeing tour is a 2-minute walk from the property. Malta international Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Ta' Cenc & Spa
address: Cenc Street, Sannat SNT 9049
description: Swimming pools, tennis courts, a private beach, and an excellent choice of cuisine for lunch and dinner; these are just a few reasons to choose Hotel Ta' Cenc. This five-star hotel boasts an impressive list of sports and leisure facilities, all on the highest point of Gozo, overlooking the cliffs. The guest rooms are housed in stone bungalows, which are spread throughout the resort. Each room comes with air conditioning and a private terrace or small garden. You could never get bored at Ta Cenc with 2 tennis courts, and 2 swimming pools; one of which has a mini pool for children and hydro massage corner.A free minibus to the private rocky beach, which is 2 km away, is available at scheduled times (high season only). Here you will find a bar and grill restaurant. Back at the hotel you can have fun with table tennis, billiards, video games, plus a host of board games. Work out at the gym and relax in the wellness centre with a heated swimming pool, Finnish sauna, hot tub, and steam bath. Pamper yourself with a solarium or massage. The professional team of staff can organise tours around Gozo. At reception you can also change currency and hire a car. The award-winning chefs prepare the finest Italian and international cuisine at the restaurant. Choose between an à la carte and set menu. Afterwards, relax out on the terrace with a drink and enjoy live music.

name: Corinthia Palace Malta
address: De Paule Avenue, Attard BZN 9023
description: Corinthia Palace Malta is set on Malta Island, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of San Anton. Guests of Corinthia Palace Malta can start their morning at Athenaeum Spa, or enjoy the many fitness and leisure facilities, including pilates classes, fitness classes and outdoor tennis courts. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a sauna and outdoor tennis courts. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature a telephone, a radio and a desk. Each morning, guests can wake up to breakfast at Rickshaw or Orange Grove Brasserie. In the evening, guests are invited to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide variety of eating options are also found nearby. Within a 20-minute drive of St. John's Co-Cathedral and Malta International Airport, Corinthia Palace Malta offers an airport shuttle service for those staying at the property. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Attard.Revato

name: The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta
address: Stj02 Dragonara Road, St. Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3143
description: Standing apart on a natural peninsula fringed by the sea, The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta brings warm-hearted, luxurious Mediterranean living to a vibrant, historic island. The property has an enviable beachside position and is accessed via private gateway, inscribed with Virgil thoughtful proverb, “God made this gem for us”. A reflection of Malta’s generous character lives through the way each guest is welcomed with easy-going charm and personalized attention. Our family resort features 408 rooms and suites which have been recently renovated. Landscaped around age-old artefacts, sunken gardens and impressive pools, our 5-star hotel has stunning ocean views throughout. The villa-style lobby is naturally light and spacious where floor-to-ceiling windows and sun-drenched terrace overlook unspoiled coastline. A multi-generational favorite, it is equally appealing to both leisure and business visitors, supported by the team organic approach to wellbeing, informed by the island’s rich culture.Marriott

name: LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa
address: Marfa Bay, Mellieha
description: Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is located in one of the best-preserved areas of northern Malta and overlooks the scenic Marfa Bay. Unspoiled views over the islands of Gozo and Comino create an idyllic Mediterranean atmosphere of relaxation. Guests of the LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa have access to a wide range of amenities, including two outdoor seawater swimming pools, an indoor seawater pool and a full-service Spa Centre. At Elysium Spa guests can choose from a wide range of therapy and beauty treatments. True relaxation, however, requires a holistic approach. It is more than just enjoying sea views, swimming pools and spa treatments. Indulging in superior food is also part of a comforting and rejuvenating vacation. The ability to savour an appetisingly crafted quality meal or taste a snack by the pool is among the most important experiences for guests of a Select Hotel. Therefore, Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa does its best to offer a wide array of world-class restaurants as well as bars for its valued guests. The hotel is located in Mellieha, a popular and picturesque village in Malta. It offers visitors a nice mix of experiences, from idyllic sandy beaches and authentic restaurants, to several historical sites. The latter include Saint Agathas Tower, the Church of our Lady Victory, and the Mellieha WWII air-raid shelters. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa also provides adventure seeking guests with the ability to take part in various scuba diving activities. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a diverse vacation in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.iHotelier/iStay

name: Intercontinental Malta
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: InterContinental Malta has established itself as the Mediterranean’s leading hotel of distinction. Located in the prime area of St. George’s Bay in St. Julian's, just seven kilometres from Valletta. All 481 rooms are elegantly furnished, having all the comforts expected of a luxury hotel. With a variety of restaurants and bars, the hotel offers varied cuisine at all times of the day. The leisure facilities include three pools, a kids club, a Fitness Centre, a spa, a beach club and room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay
address: St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's
description: Combining a luxurious setting with premium facilities, Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay offers a swimming pool, a private beach and free Wi-Fi. It is located a 20-minute car ride from Malta International Airport and an airport shuttle is available for guests. Guests of the hotel can begin their day at Richard Geres Personal Training, or enjoy the various fitness amenities, such as a diving centre. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and babysitting/child services. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and a coffee maker. They each offer slippers, heating and a flat-screen TV. Guests of Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay are invited to sample regional and international cuisine at Fra Martino, or try local dishes at Caviar & Bull. Dining options at the hotel include Le Café and Henry J. Bean's Bar & Grill. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Pearl Lounge. The area around Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay has a range of cafés and restaurants. St Julians is within a 20-minute walk of the hotel, and local sightseeing information can be found at the tour desk.Revato

name: Luna Holiday Complex
address: Marfa Road, Mellieha MLH02
description: Luna Holiday Complex offers self-catering accommodation 400 metres away from the beach on Mellieha Bay. It features 2 outdoor swimming pools, an indoor pool for winter months and a range of bars and restaurants. Luna Holiday apartments are well equipped with a kitchenette and living area. Free WiFi is available in the lobby. A continental breakfast is available daily. This 3-star complex also features a small grocery market, a diving centre and Fitness Gym.

name: Grand Hotel Excelsior
address: 1810 Great Siege Road, Floriana Valletta, Valletta FRN 1810
description: Luxury 5 Star Hotel and Beach Resort with private sandy beach and private 30 Berth Yacht Marina.Located by the Waters edge and in close proximity to the Capital City of Malta, Valletta.The hotel is embraced by the historical bastion walls of the World Heritage City of Valletta. The spectacular water's edge location is breathtaking, blending contemporary vision with the rich history that graces Marsamxett Harbour and Valletta. A Grand Ballroom, an Exhibition Hall and meeting rooms; the majority having natural light, The hotel offers over 4,000 square meters of versatile conference & banqueting facilities with complimentary WIFI also available throughout the hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort
address: 1, St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3390
description: Set in Pembroke, Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta offers a range of superior features, including 6 swimming pools and exclusive access to a secluded beach. It also provides a private dock, a beauty centre and free wireless internet access in all areas. Guests of the hotel can start their day at Pilates Centre, or enjoy the many leisure facilities, such as a diving centre. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. There are 249 rooms at Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. There are also several rooms especially designed for families. Guests of Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta are welcome to sample Asian cuisine at Buddhamann, or try Italian and regional meals at Da Marina. Dining options at the hotel include Cafe24 and White Olive. Other dining options are also available. The area around Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta has a variety of cafés and restaurants. St Julians and Is-Swieqi are just a short drive away.Revato

name: Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature
address: Rua Carvalho Araujo 1, 9000-022 Funchal, Madeira
description: The luxurious Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort is set amidst tropical gardens in the Bay of Funchal, featuring 2 heated lagoon-style pools and private ocean access. The 5-star hotel combines exotically decorated interiors and contemporary architecture." All the stylish suites and rooms are beautifully decorated and have sophisticated furnishings, as well as a private balcony with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Each has a modern bathroom with free toiletries and the suites have a full kitchenette. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature also boasts a poolside bar and a bar with nightly live music and refreshing cocktails. Guests may have a taste of exquisite Portuguese flavours at The Armada, an à la carte and buffet restaurant, which also offers international cuisine options. Following a day of touring the island and enjoying the sights, guests may unwind at the spa, an ideal spot for a relaxing massage, a visit to the gym or indoor pool. Guests can soak up the sun on the extensive ocean front solarium. The attentive staff can organise various off-site activities, including arrangements for golf as well as provide a rental car service. The Funchal Marina is a 14-minute walk from the Hotel. Guests may also try their luck at the slot machines of Madeira Casino, which is 700 metres away. The greenery of Madeira's Botanical Gardens is 4 km away, while the stunning views of Girão Cape are within 12 km. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature is 23 km from Madeira International Airport.

name: Sentido Galosol
address: Rua D. Francisco Santana, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: This beach resort in Caniço, Madeira offers a gym, massage services and beauty treatments. It has 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 3 pools and panoramic sea views. Funchal’s centre is a 20-minute drive away. The rooms at the 4-star Galo Resort Hotel Galosol have a balcony with panoramic sea views. They also have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. All rooms have free WiFi access. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxation treatments at the spa, including stone massages, pedicures and manicures. They can also attend aerobics or yoga classes and anti-stress programs. A diving centre is also available. The Hotel Galosol also features a restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the ocean. The Galo Resort is a 20-minute drive from Madeira Airport.

name: Pestana Palms
address: Rua do Gorgulho, 17, 9000-107 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within a leafy garden, this apart-hotel boasts an outdoor pool overlooking Funchal coastal cliffs. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel‘s studios are spacious and decorated with soft beige colours. Each one has low-back armchairs in the lounge area and TV with multilingual cable channels. A Flor do Mar Restaurant has large windows overlooking the ocean and also hosts regular entertainment events. Salads, light snacks and cakes are available in the cosy Vila Lido Tea Room. The hotel’s attentive staff can organize outdoor excursions around the coastline. The apart-hotel’s surrounding area also features nature and walking trails. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel is 2 km away from Funchal town centre’s local museums. Free parking is available on site, subject to availability.

name: Sentido Galomar - Adults Only
address: Rua D Francisco Santana 10, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: Perched on a cliff at Ponta D’Oliveira, Galo Resort Hotel Galomar offers stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. It features direct sea access and indoor and outdoor pools. The rooms at Hotel Galomar are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony with scenic sea views. The Ashoka Spa offers a wide variety of treatments, including Ayurveda therapy. It also offers saunas and a hot tub. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood at Restaurant Atlantis, at Hotel Galosol also features our buffet restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace.The Blue Bar at Galosol and Capoeira Pub offer a wide variety of drinks and snacks. Caniço’s centre is 2.5 km from Galo Resort Hotel Galomar, and Funchal’s centre is 12 km away.

name: The Cliff Bay
address: Estrada Monumental 147, 9004-532 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Atlantic Ocean stretches as far as the eye can see at the foot of The Cliff Bay. Perched on the top of a natural promontory, the hotel is surrounded by gardens - with innumerable secluded corners and centenary palm trees extending to the very edge of the cliff face. The panorama is completed by a magnificent view over the bay of Funchal to the east of the hotel. This 5 star hotel, one of PortoBay Hotels premium resorts, assures that every single little detail has been carefully conceived to present genuine peace, well-being and elegance. In the hotels sea access area one can combine the Atlantic Ocean breeze with the spell-binding views when choosing the new pontoons and solariums. The most influential restaurant guide in the world, the Michelin Guide, has awarded the Il Gallo d'Oro, The Cliff Bay's gourmet restaurant, run by Chef Benot Sinthon, with 2 Stars.iHotelier/iStay

name: Vidamar Resort Hotel Madeira - Dine Around Half Board
address: Estrada Monumental 175-177, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: A popular hotel due to its extensive 5-star facilities and exclusive DINE AROUND meal plan. Competitively priced large sea front rooms with balconies and King Size beds. Thalasso Sea Spa and free membership to the exclusive VIDA health and fitness club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Albatroz Beach & Yacht Club
address: Quinta Dr. Americo Durao, 9100-187 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Boasting 400 meters of private sea front, this 5-star property offers spacious rooms all with balcony and views of the Atlantic and the Deserted Islands. There are 3 pools, 2 at the sea level with sea water and private access to the sea and 1 at the hotel level with heated water. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Hotel Albatroz Madeira’s rooms have free tea and coffee making facilities and include nautical motifs and traditional hand-painted tile panels. Each bathroom has a double basin sink and includes a bathrobe with slippers. Guests at the Albatroz can relax by the pools and enjoy the views over Santa Cruz Bay. It is also possible to play a game of tennis or to practice the swing at the Santo da Serra championship golf course, 2 km away. The à la carte restaurant serves a Mediterranean menu as well as local dishes. The indoor area offers windows with stunning sea views. It is also possible to eat outdoors by the pool bar. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange complementary airport shuttles to Madeira Airport, a 5-minute drive away. It is also possible to rent a car and drive up to Funchal, 20-minutes away. Free parking is available.

name: Rocamar Lido Resort
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira 7, Caniço de Baixo, Apartado 23, Canico, 9125-028 Caniço, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff overlooking the ocean, Roca Mar features a solarium and an outdoor pool. Located in Caniço de Baixo, it offers spacious rooms with a private balcony. Hotel Roca Mar’s rooms are bright and sunny with glass sliding doors opening onto a furnished balcony. Each one has a lounge area with a plush armchair, work desk and cable TV. Roca Mar’s restaurant specializes in seafood including sword fish and octopus, all served alongside regional wines. Guests can also enjoy live music shows at the Bar Restaurant. Roca Mar Hotel is 8 km from Madeira Airport. Palheiro Golf Course is 20 minutes’ drive away. Hotel minibus to Funchal available on weekdays (subject to availability and payment).

name: Hotel Apartamento Cais Da Oliveira
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira, Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Boasting a cliff-top location a 10-minute drive from Funchal, this 4-star hotel features studios and suites with a private balcony. It has a private access to the beach, a waterfront terrace and 2 pools. The air-conditioned accommodations at Caniço's Hotel Cais da Oliveira include satellite TV and a kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Each private bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Cais da Oliveira features an à la carte restaurant. The bar serves refreshing drinks and cocktails. Guests may also go for a work-out in the fitness centre, or even relax at the solarium, both situated at the next-door Royal Orchid Hotel. The unit is located 2 km from the centre of Caniço. For golfing enthusiasts, the property is 8 km away from Palheiro Golf and 15 km from the Santo da Serra Golf Course. On weekdays, the 24-hour reception staff provides a minibus service to Funchal (subject to availability and payment), which is a 10-minute drive away. It is also possible to rent cars and bikes. The property is is 9 km from Madeira’s International Airport.

name: Pestana Madeira Beach Club
address: Largo Antonio Nobre nº1, Funchal Ilha da Madeira, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: What strikes your fancy, the city or the sea? Just walking distance from the capital Funchal, this resort has all the city has to offer, but is graced with a seaside view and a multitude of amenities. Head to the sea for water sports when you want a little adventure, or take advantage of all the resort offers including two pools and all the facilities of the Carlton Hotel, including the restaurants, nightclub, bars, tea room, beauty salon, fitness center and tennis court.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Royal Orchid
address: Travessa Vista da Praia, PO Box 38, Canico, 9125-039 Caniço, Madeira
description: Overlooking the Atlantic, this beachfront hotel offers private access to the Ocean, 2 pools and a wellness centre. Hotel minibus to Funchal available on weekdays (subject to availability and payment). The rooms, studios and suites at Hotel Royal Orchid are modern in style and include an LCD TV and air conditioning. Each accommodation has a kitchenette and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Sister Hotel Rocamar's restaurant provides lots of daylight and serves regional as well as international cuisine, including freshly caught fish and tender beef. Madeira wine is available at the Bar. Besides the heated indoor pool and outdoor pool, guests can enjoy massages or visit the sauna and steam bath in the Nautilus Health Club. Sun beds, umbrellas and showers are available at the sun terrace, which overlooks Caniço Bay. Hotel Royal Orchid is just a 20 minutes’ drive away from Funchal, Palheiro Golf Course and the Santo da Serra Golf Course. The hotel offers paid parking as well as a car-rental and bike-rental service. All services and facilities from the neighbouring Hotels Roca Mar and Cais da Oliveira are available to the Royal Orchid guests during their stay.

name: Sana Sesimbra Hotel
address: Avenida 25 de Abril, 11, 2970 Sesimbra, Setubal
description: No description found

name: Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve
address: Praia da Falesia, P.O. Box 644, 8200 Albufeira, Faro
description: Treat yourself to a matchless vacation at the mesmerizing Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve in Albufeira. This iconic, 5-star cliff-top retreat is located above Portugal's famous beach, Praia da Falésia, and boasts stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. With a Moorish influenced decor, our hotel's newly-renovated guest rooms teem with exquisite, indigenous details, plush beds and spa-inspired bathrooms. Each hotel room boasts a private balcony with views of Algarve's red cliffs overlooking the ocean or beautifully manicured gardens. Our resort's exceptional amenities include a 9- hole golf course, a tennis club, a revitalizing spa, 8 swimming pools, an up-to-date fitness center and a variety of fine dining options. Families love our fantastic kid's facilities including Porto Pirata, the biggest kids club in the region. Whether in Albufeira, Portugal for business or for pleasure, Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve wants to make your stay a flawless 5-star experience.Marriott

name: Penina Hotel & Golf Resort
address: Estrada Nacional 125, 8501-952 Portimão, Faro
description: Set within expansive, lush gardens, this 5-star resort in the Algarve is 5 km from Portimão and the city of Lagos. Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a selection of sports and leisure facilities, including 3 golf courses and a large outdoor swimming pool. The rooms at Penina Hotel & Golf Resort are filled with natural light and have plush beds with white linens. Some open onto balconies and feature seating areas. Many overlook the pool area. Leisure amenities include massage treatments, a sauna, a well-equipped fitness centre, 5 on site tennis courts. For younger guests, Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a Children's Club, which offers weekly programmes with a selection of leisure and sporting activities. There are 5 restaurants available, which serve a range of Portuguese, Italian and international cuisine. Children’s menus and themed evenings are offered. The 4 on site bars provide light snacks and cocktails. Free parking is offered at the hotel. Alvor Beach and Continente Shopping Centre are both a 5-minute drive away from the Penina Hotel & Golf Resort.

name: Hotel Azur Premium
address: Erkel Ferenc U. 2/d, Siófok 8600
description: The 5-star Hotel Azur Premium in Siófok offers a private beach on Lake Balaton and a large wellness centre with an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna and panoramic views of the lake. Its stylish rooms all have a balcony. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Air conditioning and flat-screen cable TV are standard room facilities. Decorated in terracotta colours, every room comes with a minibar, bathrobes and toiletries. Some rooms also enjoy direct views of Lake Balaton and the Tihany Peninsula. With 1,800 m², the wellness centre offers a great range of spa facilities including an infrared cabin and 3 Finnish saunas. The services of the beauty centre and massage rooms are available for a surcharge. Premium Azur also has an outdoor pool and sun terrace where you can relax in the summer. Hungarian and international dishes are served at the restaurant. At the wine bar guests can taste the quality wines of the local wine cellars. Hotel Azur Premium also features a garden and a playground for children. There is a free fitness centre on site, while billiards and bowling can be enjoyed for an additional fee. Siófok Train Station is 1.3 km away.

name: Hotel Azur Siofok
address: Erkel Ferenc Utca 2/c, Siófok 8600
description: Boasting a free private sandy beach as well as a free wellness centre with 2 pools, a hot tub and a sauna, Hotel Azur Siofok is located in Siófok, on the shore of Lake Balaton. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms provide a seating area. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Azur Siofok also features an on-site restaurant, while guests can also have a drink at the bar. You can relax in the garden or on the sun terrace, or do exercise in the fitness centre. A children’s playground is also located on the premises, while bowling and billiards are available for a surcharge. Meeting and banquet facilities can be arranged for an additional fee. The property also provides bike rental and free luggage storage, while staff at the 24-hour reception can help with tour planning. Siófok Train Station is set 1 km from Hotel Azur Siofok.

name: Hotel Club Tihany
address: Rev u.3., Tihany 8237
description: Located on the shore of Lake Balaton, Hotel Club Tihany offers thermal pools and a large sports centre. The rooms are equipped with a minibar, satellite TV and hairdryers. Club Tihany provides a spa area including an indoor pool, a pool with massage jets and a waterfall and an outdoor children’s pool. Guests can relax in the hotel’s sauna or steam bath. Massages and beauty treatments are also offered. Set within a nature park reserve, Hotel Tihany features a water sport facility for surfing or sailing from May till September, as well as a sports centre for tennis or minigolf, among others. Guests can also go kite surfing, kayaking or bowling. A restaurant with international and Hungarian cuisine and a bar are on site. In Summer, a beach side restaurant and a pool bar are also available. The Royal Balaton Golf Club can be reached within 8 km.

name: Hunguest Hotel Bal Resort
address: Bajcsy-Zsilinszky Street 14, Balatonalmádi 8220
description: The Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort in Balatonalmádi offers panoramic views over Lake Balaton and a modern spa centre with a large indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort are air-conditioned and feature a satellite TV with pay TV channels and a minibar. Spa facilities include a hot tub, saunas, steam baths and a wide range of massages. From the relaxation room you can enjoy views of the lush green garden. Typical Hungarian specialities as well as international cuisine are served in the restaurant of the Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort. The property offers private parking for a surcharge.

name: Club Tihany Bungalows
address:

description: Located on the shore of Lake Balaton, Club Tihany Bungalows offers individual units with access to thermal pools and a large sports centre. The bungalows are air-conditioned and equipped with a fully-fitted kitchen. The neighbouring Hotel Club Tihany provides a spa area including an indoor pool, a pool with massage jets and a waterfall and an outdoor children’s pool. Guests can relax in the hotel’s sauna or steam bath. Massages and beauty treatments are also offered. Set within a nature park reserve, Club Tihany Bungalows provides water sport facilities for surfing or sailing from May till September, as well as a sports centre for tennis or minigolf, among others. Guests can also go kite surfing, kayaking or bowling. A restaurant with international and Hungarian cuisine and a bar are on site. In Summer, a beachside restaurant and a pool bar are also available.

name: Sirius Hotelsuperior
address: 8 Mikus Gyula Sétány, Keszthely 8360
description: Set in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Sirius Hotel****Superior offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 8 km from Thermal Lake Hévíz, 30 km from Sümeg Castle and 48 km from Zalaszentiván Vasútállomás. Festetics Castle is 1.9 km away and Blue Church is 7.9 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sirius Hotel****Superior all rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Sirius Hotel****Superior offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna, hot tub and spa centre. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English and Hungarian. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from Sirius Hotel****Superior.

name: Lua Resort - Adults Only
address: Anna Sétány 5, Balatonfüred 8230
description: Facing the beachfront, LUA Resort - Adults only offers 5-star accommodation in Balatonfüred and has a shared lounge, terrace and restaurant. 2.7 km from Eszterhazy Beach and 6.8 km from Tihany Abbey, the property offers a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. LUA Resort - Adults only provides some rooms with lake views, and rooms come with a balcony. All units will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden. Annagora Aquapark is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Balatonfüred train station is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 87 km from LUA Resort - Adults only.

name: Hotel Helikon
address: Mikus Gyula sétány 5., Keszthely 8360
description: Located in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Hotel Helikon, Keszthely provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a lake view. Every room includes a safety deposit box and selected rooms are equipped with city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at Hotel Helikon, Keszthely. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving local, international and Hungarian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hotel Helikon, Keszthely offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a spa centre. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Hotel Helikon, Keszthely include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Otp Balatonszemes
address: Parti Sétány 159., Balatonszemes 8636
description: Set in Balatonszemes, 35 km from Bebo Aquapark, Hotel OTP Balatonszemes offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. 42 km from Bella Stables and Animal Park and 17 km from Balaton Sound, the property features a private beach area, as well as a tennis court. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and hot tub, as well as a bar. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms come with a balcony. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 3-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Be My Lake Festival is 18 km from Hotel OTP Balatonszemes, while Zamardi Adventure Park is 25 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 62 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Marina Port
address: Kikötő 2-4, Balatonkenese 8174
description: The child-friendly Hotel Marina Port in Balatonkenese is located next to the port and it offers a restaurant, a wellness area and air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available. In the wellness department you can find an indoor pool, a hot tub with panoramic views of the lake, a Finnish sauna, and infrared sauna with salt therapy and with cardio and fitness machines. Children can spend their time in the kids’ pool. The restaurant serves traditional Hungarian dishes on à la carte basis. The closest shop is situated 300 metres away. At the hotel's private beach you can find sunbeds and parasols, a tennis court, football field and a children's playground. The town of Székesfehérvár can be reached in 30 minutes by car. Budapest is 90 km from the Marina Port Hotel.

name: Tisza-beach wild camping 5
description: Situated in Szeged in the Csongrád region, with Votive Church Szeged and Szeged National Theater nearby, Tisza-beach wild camping 5 features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a fitness room. At the campground you will find a restaurant serving Hungarian and grill bbq cuisine. Tisza-beach wild camping 5 offers an outdoor fireplace. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Ópusztaszer Heritage Park is 29 km from Tisza-beach wild camping 5, while New Synagogue is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Arad International Airport, 94 km from the campground.

name: Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference
address: Damjanich utca 10., Hajdúszoboszló 4200
description: Just 30 metres from the Aqua-Palace and a 5-minute walk from Hajdúszoboszló’s thermal bath, Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference has a modern spa with an indoor pool, a stylish pool terrace, a gym, and a restaurant. Air conditioning and free WiFi are standard room facilities at Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference. Each room has its own balcony. Flooded with natural light, the indoor pool lies in the centre of the wellness centre. Next to it there is a large hot tub and plenty of lounging space. There are different types of saunas, steam baths and even an ice cave. Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference’s restaurant serves national and international dishes. For a light snack or a drink, there is also a bar. Room service is available.

name: Colosseum Hotel
address: Milleniumi Sétány 4-6, Mórahalom 6782
description: This elegant 4-star hotel is located in Mórahalom, 21 km from the centre of Szeged. It offers well furnished rooms with air conditioning, spacious wellness area with 6 indoor pools and free entrance to the Szent Erzsébet Thermal Bath. Each room has free access to Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV. A modern bathroom with bathrobes, slippers and toiletries are available as well. Colosseum Hotel has a spa area including a hot tub, a sauna and a steam bath. Massages are offered and a beauty shop is on site. Guests can get active in the fitness centre or rent a bicycle and explore the surrounding area. The Colosseum’ restaurant offers à la carte dishes Hungarian cuisine and International cuisine in the elegant dining room or on the sunny terrace. Room service is provided on request. Free private parking is offered at the hotel.

name: Hotel Délibáb
address: József Attila U. 5-7., Hajdúszoboszló 4200
description: The 4-star Hotel Délibáb is located next to the popular Hungarospa Bath, the biggest bath complex in Europe. Hajdúszoboszló city is located at the edge of Hortobágy Puszta and is just 20 km from Debrecen. Wi-Fi is available in all areas of the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms feature an LCD TV, a minibar and anti-stress bed linen. The private bathroom comes with a shower, bathrobes and a hair-dryer. For an extra charge, guests can access the Bath Complex through the open-air courtyard of the property. Hotel Delibab offers buffet breakfast, half board and 1 à la carte restaurant with modern Hungarian and international dishes. The bar features darts and billiard facilities.

name: Vilnius Grand Resort
address: Highway A2, The 19Th km (P.O.Box 2590), Vilnius 03005
description: Vilnius Grand Resort is set among 280 hectares of verdant countryside and sprawling by pine and birch forest. The hotel features free WiFi, a large, heated indoor swimming pool, steam baths and saunas. The hotel offers well-appointed rooms as well as luxurious suites. Most of them have an LCD TV with interactive programming. Guests can relax in the V SPA Wellness centre, with 2 spa areas Aqua and Vitality. Aqua spa area features a swimming pool, kids pool with a water slide, sauna, steam bath and a hot tub. Vitality pool area comes with cascades, grotto, outside and inside hot tub, steam bath, Finnish and Russian saunas and relaxation rooms. Please note that Vitality pool area is adults only. There is also a tennis court and the hotel is surrounded by a magnificent 18-hole championship golf course - the V Golf Club. There are 2 restaurants on site. Vilnius Grand Resort offers classic European dishes with a French accent. Vilnius Grand Resort is only a 20-minute drive from the centre of Vilnius. A complimentary shuttle bus is available.

name: Medea Apartments By Upa
address: Sveikatos g. 34, Druskininkai 66001
description: Located in a quiet Druskininkai area - a pine forest on the bank of a lake, the 4-star MEDEA Apartments by UPA offers apartments and access to a spa and wellness facilities. The apartments of the MEDEA Apartments by UPA feature classic design and light colours. Each has a free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a kitchenette with a refrigerator, electric kettle, a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower and some feature a spa bath. Anti-allergic bedding is provided. The resort is located 2.4 km from the centre of town.

name: Medical Spa
address: Eglės g.1, Druskininkai LT-66412
description: Medical SPA "Eglės sanatorija" Comfort Druskininkai is residential complex with treatment centre in pinewood surroundings that has been operating since 2009. The health resort offer treatments for Neurological, cardiological, pulmonological, traumatological-orthopedic, endocrinal, gynecological, dermatological, renal, as well as illnesses connected to the movement-support apparatus and the digestive system. There is a treatment centre, where guests can receive kinesiotherapy, physiotherapy, audio-visual therapy treatments and variety of massages. There is swimming pool and sauna complex. Guests can enjoy mineral water whirl baths and pearl baths, underwater massage, white and black mud applications. All rooms of Medical SPA "Eglės sanatorija" Comfort Druskininkai are equipped with electric kettles and cable TVs. The private bathrooms feature hairdryers, bathrobes. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner is served every day, where guests will find meals for different diets, fresh fruit and vegetables, traditional Lithuanian cuisine, as well as deserts, hot and cold drinks. The property is set in a forest 4 km from central Druskininkai and 3.7 km from Snow Arena.

name: Medical Spa Egles Sanatorija Comfort Druskininkai
address: Eglės G.1, Druskininkai LT-66251
description: Medical SPA “Eglės Sanatorija” Standard Druskininkai is residential complex and treatment centre in pine forest, dating back to 1972, but underwent complete renovation in 2018. Neurological, cardiological, pulmonological, traumatological-orthopedic, endocrinal, gynecological, dermotological, renal, as well as illnesses connected to the movement-support apparatus and the digestive system are treated in Egles Sanatorija. There is a treatment centre, where guests can receive kinesiotheraphy, physiotherapy, audio-visual therapy treatments and variety of massages. It also has a swimming pool and sauna complex. Underwater massages and mud applications are also offered, the complex features several whirl baths. All rooms are equipped with electric kettles and cable TVs. The private bathrooms are equipped hairdryers, bathrobes are offered for guests. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. In a separate building, where the canteen is located, buffet meals are served 3 times a day. Guests will find a variety of meals, suited for different diets, as well as traditional Lithuanian dishes, deserts, fruit and vegetables. Hot and cold drinks are also offered. Medical SPA Eglės Sanatorija is located 4 km from the central Druskininkai.

name: PortoBay Rio de Janeiro
address: Avenida Atlântica, 1500, Rio de Janeiro 22021-000
description: Right on Copacabana beach in the spectacular city of Rio de Janeiro, hotel PortoBay Rio de Janeiro offers the best of both worlds - the marvellous city and the stunning view of the beach right at your feet. 117 rooms with private verandas or panoramic window views to get a feel for the intense life of Copacabana, the sound of the sea, sunrise over the ocean. diverse flavours in La Finestra, roof-top pool, exclusive beach service. The hotel's roof-top terrace on the 20th floor offers a spectacular panoramic view of the famous bay and major sights of Rio de Janeiro, with Copacabana beach in the foreground and Christ the Redeemer in the background. Modern, spacious and with new services, this area has a pool, massage room, two saunas, fitness centre and pool bar.iHotelier/iStayRead less

name: Cdesign Hotel
address: Av. Lucio Costa 17360, Rio de Janeiro 22795-009
description: Boasting a beachfront location just 1.5 km from Pontal Square, CDesign Hotel offers spectacular views to Recreio dos Bandeirantes Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, safety deposit box and a minibar. Bathrooms are private. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. At CDesign Hotel you will also find a 24-hour front desk. Barra Olympic Park is 10 km from CDesign Hotel, while Prainha Beach is 5 km from the property. Riocentro Convention Center is at a distance of 10 km, and Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 33 km away.Read less

Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. name: Il Campanario Villaggio Resort
address: Avenida Dos Buzios 1760, Florianopolis 88053-301
description: Il Campanário Villaggio Resort has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Florianópolis. The property is situated 200 metres from Jurere Beach, 2.3 km from Praia do Forte and 2.4 km from Jurerê Tradicional. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony. At Il Campanário Villaggio Resort the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Floripa Mall is 16 km from Il Campanário Villaggio Resort, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Jurere Beach Village
address: Al. Cesar Nascimento, 648, Florianopolis 88053-400
description: Jurerê Beach Village offers air-conditioned rooms and leisure facilities that include an outdoor pool and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. All rooms have free WiFi and are air-conditioned, with amenities such as cable TV, an equipped kitchen and a private balcony. Guests can use their wet or dry sauna. Jurerê Beach Village also has a games room and massage service. Local and international cuisines are available in their on-site restaurants. Tropical cocktails and non-alcoholic drinks are served at the bar.

name: Costa Norte Ponta Das Canas
address: Rua Deputado Fernando Viegas, 560, Florianopolis 88056-730
description: This hotel is located right on the seafront of the peaceful Ponta das Canas Beach, where an idyllic landscape and the charm of a fishing colony await you. Breakfast and dinner are included in room rates. Costa Norte provides bright rooms with balconies that face either the ocean or the hotel's patio. The accommodations also feature cable TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Bathroom is private and extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Admire the coast while enjoying the outdoor hot tub and swimming pool, or relax in the spa and indoor pool. Your whole family can also keep in shape working out in the gym or having fun in the games room and on the playground. Services such as tours, car rentals and yoga classes are also provided at an additional charge. A TV room, computers with internet access and a tastefully decorated restaurant are also available on site.

name: Hotel Porto Sol Beach
address: Rua Das Buganvilias, 123 Praia Cachoeira de Bom Jesus, Florianopolis 88056-025
description: Boasting an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Porto Sol Beach is on the beachfront and offers comfortable accommodation in Florianópolis. It features a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at Hotel Porto Sol Beach feature a cable TV, air conditioning, a seating area and a modern, en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony with a sea view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Porto Sol Beach offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at the hotel. Praia de Canasvieiras is 350 metres from Hotel Porto Sol Beach, while Pontas das Canas Beach is 2.3 km away.

name: Ingleses Praia Hotel
address: Estrada Dom Joao Becker 447, Florianopolis 88058-600
description: Located by Ingleses beach in Florianópolis, Ingleses Praia Hotel offers an outdoor pool and indoor pool with sauna. Guests can enjoy their beach service and relax by the sea. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. The accommodations are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some categories have a sea view and a kitchenette. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 39 km from the property.

name: Mabu Thermas Grand Resort
address: Av Das Cataratas 3175, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-000
description: Located above Guarani Aquifer, one of the world's largest underground water reservoirs, Mabu Thermas Grand Resort includes free breakfast and free WiFi. It features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 5-star resort has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests. Mabu Therma’s comfortable rooms are all equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a desk. The private bathrooms include a shower and a hairdryer. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Grand Resort Mabu Thermas also features outdoor pools, a swim-up bar, hot tubs, sauna, sun terrace, children's water park and other attractions and recreational activities. A spa, a restaurant and a bar with high quality cuisine are available for guests. The Three Borders Landmark is 4 km away and the entrance of Iguaçu National Park is within 9 km. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tarobá Hotel
address: 1048 Taroba Street, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-220
description: Located in Foz do Iguaçu, 16 km from Parque das Aves, Tarobá Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool, children's playground and sun terrace. Payed parking is subject to availability, on site. We also have, attached to the hotel, an currency exchange office for guests. All rooms at Tarobá Hotel have air conditioning, flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, telephone, electronic safe and private bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can enjoy an American breakfast with panoramic views of the city. There is a 24-hour front desk, gym, gift shop, as well as a games room. Guests can also enjoy the bar in the reception hall. Iguaçu National Park is also 16 km from Tarobá Hotel. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguaçu Airport, 15 km from Tarobá Hotel.

name: Portobello Praia
address: Avenida Beira Mar 6111, Porto Seguro 45810-000
description: Situated on Taperapuã Beach, Portobello Resort is a 4-star hotel offering a beach bar, tennis court, and free-form outdoor swimming pool surrounded by palm trees. The beach bar is called Veleiros, part of the Group Portobello Hotels and Resort, located on the Taperapuã Beach, 100 meters from the property. Rooms at the Portobello Resort feature tropical décor and are equipped with air conditioning, TV, and a minibar. Room service is available throughout the day. Guests of the Portobello can enjoy the game room, mini-golf, and soccer on a full-size field. The proeprty also offers a beach tennis court a fitness centre, massage room and steam sauna are also available for guest use. Terra Mater Restaurant offers Brazilian and international cuisine using fresh local ingredients. Tropical drinks and a wide selection of wines are offered at the bar. Portobello Resort is located 5 km from the lively shops and restaurants of Pôrto Seguro's centre. Porto Seguro Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Resort Villagio Arcobaleno
address: Rod. 367 - KM 67, Porto Seguro
description: On the white sands of Taperapuã Beach, this resort is surrounded by rich gardens and offers a large pool. It provides a tennis court, gym and sauna, plus free WiFi and a panoramic restaurant. Featuring a patio with garden views, the 5-star rooms in this Villagio resort are air-conditioned and include a modern bathroom. They offer a TV with cable channels, telephone, safe and minibar. Other services and facilities offered in front of the hotel at our Terrazzo Al Mare Beach Eco Club include an All-Inclusive service, and live music. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and on-site parking is free. Toa-Toa Bar is 1 km from Resort Villaggio Arcobaleno, while Memorial of Discovery is 5 km away. Porto Seguro historical centre and Porto Seguro Airport are 6 km from Resort Villaggio Arcobaleno.

name: Hotel La Foret & Beach Club
address: Rua 11 Quadra G Lotes 39 East 40, Búzios
description: Located 400 metres from Joao Fernandes Beach, Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club features 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Guests also enjoy access to an exclusive beach leisure area at Club La Plage, 400 metres away. Each room is air-conditioned. Accommodation at Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club includes a private bathroom and a balcony with a hammock. The hotel’s tour desk can offer advice on excursions. Guests can enjoy a sauna or a massage session at Club La Plage´s spa. The club features a submerged bar, a fitness area, a beauty parlour and a beachfront restaurant with a variety of dishes. Breakfast is offered at La Foret’s restaurant. The hotel’s pool bar serves drinks and snacks.
